                  getCheckSum PROC
;;;63     
;;;64     char getCheckSum(char *packet)
000000  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;65     {
;;;66     	char i=0,checksum=0;
000002  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
000004  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;67     	for(i = 1;i<8;i++)
000006  2201              MOVS     r2,#1
000008  e004              B        |L1.20|
                  |L1.10|
;;;68     	{
;;;69     		checksum += packet[i];
00000a  5c8b              LDRB     r3,[r1,r2]
00000c  4403              ADD      r3,r3,r0
00000e  b2d8              UXTB     r0,r3
000010  1c53              ADDS     r3,r2,#1              ;67
000012  b2da              UXTB     r2,r3                 ;67
                  |L1.20|
000014  2a08              CMP      r2,#8                 ;67
000016  dbf8              BLT      |L1.10|
;;;70       }
;;;71     	checksum = 0xff -checksum;
000018  f1c000ff          RSB      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;72     	checksum += 1;
00001c  1c43              ADDS     r3,r0,#1
00001e  b2d8              UXTB     r0,r3
;;;73     	return checksum;
;;;74     }
000020  4770              BX       lr
;;;75     	
                          ENDP

                  Do_Xor PROC
;;;76     u8 Do_Xor(u8 *p,u8 length) //数组，异或操作数组结束长度 指针参数不支持inline关键字？？？

;;;77     {
000024  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;78       u8 i,result;
;;;79       result = *p;

;;;80       for(i=1;i<length;i++)

                  |L1.44|
;;;81       {
;;;82         result ^= *(++p);

;;;83       }
;;;84       return result;

                  decode_PM_data PROC

                  delay_us_motor PROC
;;;178    void delay_us_motor(int usneed)

;;;179    {
;;;180    	int i;
;;;181    	for(i=0;i<usneed;i++)

                  motor_step_move PROC
;;;190    static char step_motor_moving_flag = 0;
;;;191    void motor_step_move(int step_num,char direct)
000288  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;192    {
00028a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00028c  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;193    	static int step_state = 0;
;;;194    	unsigned int i =0;
00028e  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;195    	//M_EN1_DISABLE;
;;;196    	//M_EN2_DISABLE;
;;;197    	M_EN1_EN;
000290  f44f5080          MOV      r0,#0x1000
000294  4972              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
000296  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;198    	M_EN2_EN;
000298  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
00029a  4973              LDR      r1,|L1.1128|
00029c  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;199    	while(i<step_num)
00029e  e0bb              B        |L1.1048|
                  |L1.672|
;;;200    	{
;;;201    		step_motor_moving_flag = 1;
0002a0  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0002a2  4972              LDR      r1,|L1.1132|
0002a4  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;202    		switch(step_state)
0002a6  f1010024          ADD      r0,r1,#0x24
0002aa  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_state
0002ac  2808              CMP      r0,#8
0002ae  d27e              BCS      |L1.942|
0002b0  e8dff000          TBB      [pc,r0]
0002b4  04132231          DCB      0x04,0x13,0x22,0x31
0002b8  404f5e6d          DCB      0x40,0x4f,0x5e,0x6d
;;;203    		{
;;;204    				case 0:
;;;205    								M_IN1_LOW;
0002bc  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
0002c0  4967              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
0002c2  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;206    								M_IN2_HIGH;
0002c4  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
0002c6  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;207    								M_IN3_HIGH;
0002c8  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0002ca  4969              LDR      r1,|L1.1136|
0002cc  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;208    								M_IN4_HIGH;
0002ce  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
0002d2  4959              LDR      r1,|L1.1080|
0002d4  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;209    								break;
0002d8  e078              B        |L1.972|
;;;210    				case 1:
;;;211    								M_IN1_LOW;
0002da  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
0002de  4960              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
0002e0  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;212    								M_IN2_LOW;
0002e2  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
0002e4  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;213    								M_IN3_HIGH;
0002e6  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0002e8  4961              LDR      r1,|L1.1136|
0002ea  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;214    								M_IN4_HIGH;
0002ec  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
0002f0  4951              LDR      r1,|L1.1080|
0002f2  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;215    								break;
0002f6  e069              B        |L1.972|
;;;216    				case 2:
;;;217    								M_IN1_HIGH;
0002f8  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
0002fc  4958              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
0002fe  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;218    								M_IN2_LOW;
000300  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000302  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;219    								M_IN3_HIGH;
000304  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000306  495a              LDR      r1,|L1.1136|
000308  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;220    								M_IN4_HIGH;
00030a  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
00030e  494a              LDR      r1,|L1.1080|
000310  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;221    								break;
000314  e05a              B        |L1.972|
;;;222    				case 3:
;;;223    								M_IN1_HIGH;
000316  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
00031a  4951              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
00031c  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;224    								M_IN2_LOW;
00031e  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000320  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;225    								M_IN3_LOW;
000322  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000324  4953              LDR      r1,|L1.1140|
000326  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;226    								M_IN4_HIGH;
000328  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
00032c  4942              LDR      r1,|L1.1080|
00032e  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;227    								break;
000332  e04b              B        |L1.972|
;;;228    				case 4:
;;;229    								M_IN1_HIGH;
000334  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
000338  4949              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
00033a  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;230    								M_IN2_HIGH;
00033c  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
00033e  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;231    								M_IN3_LOW;
000340  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000342  494c              LDR      r1,|L1.1140|
000344  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;232    								M_IN4_HIGH;
000346  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
00034a  493b              LDR      r1,|L1.1080|
00034c  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;233    								break;
000350  e03c              B        |L1.972|
;;;234    				case 5:
;;;235    								M_IN1_HIGH;
000352  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
000356  4942              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
000358  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;236    								M_IN2_HIGH;
00035a  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
00035c  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;237    								M_IN3_LOW;
00035e  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000360  4944              LDR      r1,|L1.1140|
000362  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;238    								M_IN4_LOW;
000364  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
000368  4933              LDR      r1,|L1.1080|
00036a  f8c10814          STR      r0,[r1,#0x814]
;;;239    								break;
00036e  e02d              B        |L1.972|
;;;240    				case 6:
;;;241    								M_IN1_HIGH;
000370  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
000374  493a              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
000376  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;242    								M_IN2_HIGH;
000378  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
00037a  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;243    								M_IN3_HIGH;
00037c  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00037e  493c              LDR      r1,|L1.1136|
000380  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;244    								M_IN4_LOW;
000382  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
000386  492c              LDR      r1,|L1.1080|
000388  f8c10814          STR      r0,[r1,#0x814]
;;;245    								break;
00038c  e01e              B        |L1.972|
;;;246    				case 7:
;;;247    								M_IN1_LOW;
00038e  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
000392  4933              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
000394  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;248    								M_IN2_HIGH;
000396  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000398  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;249    								M_IN3_HIGH;
00039a  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00039c  4934              LDR      r1,|L1.1136|
00039e  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;250    								M_IN4_LOW;
0003a0  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
0003a4  4924              LDR      r1,|L1.1080|
0003a6  f8c10814          STR      r0,[r1,#0x814]
;;;251    								break;
0003aa  e00f              B        |L1.972|
0003ac  e7ff              B        |L1.942|
                  |L1.942|
;;;252    				default:
;;;253    					      M_IN1_LOW;
0003ae  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
0003b2  492b              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
0003b4  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;254    								M_IN2_LOW;
0003b6  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
0003b8  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;255    								M_IN3_LOW;
0003ba  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0003bc  492d              LDR      r1,|L1.1140|
0003be  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;256    								M_IN4_LOW;
0003c0  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
0003c4  491c              LDR      r1,|L1.1080|
0003c6  f8c10814          STR      r0,[r1,#0x814]
;;;257    				        break;
0003ca  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.972|
0003cc  bf00              NOP                            ;209
;;;258    		}
;;;259    		if(direct==0)
0003ce  b96d              CBNZ     r5,|L1.1004|
;;;260    		{
;;;261    			step_state ++;
0003d0  4826              LDR      r0,|L1.1132|
0003d2  3024              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x24
0003d4  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_state
0003d6  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0003d8  4924              LDR      r1,|L1.1132|
0003da  3124              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x24
0003dc  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; step_state
;;;262    			if(step_state>=8)
0003de  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0003e0  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_state
0003e2  2808              CMP      r0,#8
0003e4  db13              BLT      |L1.1038|
;;;263    			{
;;;264    				step_state = 0;
0003e6  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0003e8  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; step_state
0003ea  e010              B        |L1.1038|
                  |L1.1004|
;;;265          }
;;;266        }
;;;267    		else
;;;268    		{
;;;269    			if(step_state>0)
0003ec  481f              LDR      r0,|L1.1132|
0003ee  3024              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x24
0003f0  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_state
0003f2  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0003f4  dd07              BLE      |L1.1030|
;;;270    			{
;;;271    			  step_state--;
0003f6  481d              LDR      r0,|L1.1132|
0003f8  3024              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x24
0003fa  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_state
0003fc  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0003fe  491b              LDR      r1,|L1.1132|
000400  3124              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x24
000402  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; step_state
000404  e003              B        |L1.1038|
                  |L1.1030|
;;;272    			}
;;;273    			else
;;;274    			{
;;;275    				step_state = 7;
000406  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
000408  4918              LDR      r1,|L1.1132|
00040a  3124              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x24
00040c  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; step_state
                  |L1.1038|
;;;276          }
;;;277    			
;;;278        }
;;;279    		i++;
00040e  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1
;;;280    		//delay_us_motor(50);
;;;281    		delay_us(5000);
000410  f2413088          MOV      r0,#0x1388
000414  f7fffffe          BL       delay_us
                  |L1.1048|
000418  42a6              CMP      r6,r4                 ;199
00041a  f4ffaf41          BCC      |L1.672|
;;;282    	}
;;;283    	step_motor_moving_flag = 0;
00041e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000420  4912              LDR      r1,|L1.1132|
000422  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;284    	M_EN1_DISABLE;
000424  f44f5080          MOV      r0,#0x1000
000428  490d              LDR      r1,|L1.1120|
00042a  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;285    	M_EN2_DISABLE;
00042c  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
00042e  4912              LDR      r1,|L1.1144|
000430  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;286    }
000432  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.1076|
                          DCD      0x40010c10
                  |L1.1080|
                          DCD      0x40010000
                  |L1.1084|
                          DCD      PM25DMABuffer
                  |L1.1088|
                          DCD      PM2_5_concentration
                  |L1.1092|
                          DCD      PM2_5_value
                  |L1.1096|
                          DCD      display_CO2_conc
                  |L1.1100|
                          DCD      0x00989680
                  |L1.1104|
                          DCD      display_num_PM
                  |L1.1108|
                          DCD      0x000f4240
                  |L1.1112|
                          DCD      0x000186a0
                  |L1.1116|
                          DCD      display_conc_PM
                  |L1.1120|
                          DCD      0x40011000
                  |L1.1124|
                          DCD      0x4001140c
                  |L1.1128|
                          DCD      0x40011410
                  |L1.1132|
                          DCD      ||.data||+0x1c
                  |L1.1136|
                          DCD      0x40010810
                  |L1.1140|
                          DCD      0x40010814
                  |L1.1144|
                          DCD      0x40011414
                          ENDP

                  start_motor PROC
;;;287    
;;;288    void start_motor(void)
00047c  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;289    {
;;;290    	 bsp_StartTimer(2,3000);//led start question
00047e  f64031b8          MOV      r1,#0xbb8
000482  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000484  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StartTimer
;;;291    	 TIM3->CCR2 = 12;//48;
000488  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
00048a  49ff              LDR      r1,|L1.2184|
00048c  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;292    	 while(bsp_CheckTimer(2)==0);	 
00048e  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1168|
000490  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000492  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_CheckTimer
000496  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000498  d0fa              BEQ      |L1.1168|
;;;293    }
00049a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;294    
                          ENDP

                  step_motor_init PROC
;;;295    void step_motor_init(void)
00049c  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;296    {
;;;297    	static int step_state_init = 0;
;;;298    	M_EN1_EN;
00049e  f44f5080          MOV      r0,#0x1000
0004a2  49fa              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
0004a4  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;299    	M_EN2_EN;
0004a6  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
0004a8  49f9              LDR      r1,|L1.2192|
0004aa  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;300    	while((GPIOA->IDR & GPIO_Pin_5)!=0)
0004ac  e0a3              B        |L1.1526|
                  |L1.1198|
;;;301    	{
;;;302    		switch(step_state_init)
0004ae  48f9              LDR      r0,|L1.2196|
0004b0  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_state_init
0004b2  2808              CMP      r0,#8
0004b4  d27e              BCS      |L1.1460|
0004b6  e8dff000          TBB      [pc,r0]
0004ba  0413              DCB      0x04,0x13
0004bc  2231404f          DCB      0x22,0x31,0x40,0x4f
0004c0  5e6d              DCB      0x5e,0x6d
;;;303    		{
;;;304    				case 0:
;;;305    								M_IN1_LOW;
0004c2  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
0004c6  49f1              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
0004c8  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;306    								M_IN2_HIGH;
0004ca  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
0004cc  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;307    								M_IN3_HIGH;
0004ce  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0004d0  49f1              LDR      r1,|L1.2200|
0004d2  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;308    								M_IN4_HIGH;
0004d4  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
0004d8  49f0              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
0004da  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;309    								break;
0004de  e078              B        |L1.1490|
;;;310    				case 1:
;;;311    								M_IN1_LOW;
0004e0  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
0004e4  49e9              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
0004e6  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;312    								M_IN2_LOW;
0004e8  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
0004ea  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;313    								M_IN3_HIGH;
0004ec  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0004ee  49ea              LDR      r1,|L1.2200|
0004f0  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;314    								M_IN4_HIGH;
0004f2  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
0004f6  49e9              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
0004f8  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;315    								break;
0004fc  e069              B        |L1.1490|
;;;316    				case 2:
;;;317    								M_IN1_HIGH;
0004fe  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
000502  49e2              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
000504  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;318    								M_IN2_LOW;
000506  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000508  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;319    								M_IN3_HIGH;
00050a  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00050c  49e2              LDR      r1,|L1.2200|
00050e  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;320    								M_IN4_HIGH;
000510  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
000514  49e1              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
000516  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;321    								break;
00051a  e05a              B        |L1.1490|
;;;322    				case 3:
;;;323    								M_IN1_HIGH;
00051c  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
000520  49da              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
000522  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;324    								M_IN2_LOW;
000524  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000526  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;325    								M_IN3_LOW;
000528  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00052a  49dd              LDR      r1,|L1.2208|
00052c  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;326    								M_IN4_HIGH;
00052e  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
000532  49da              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
000534  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;327    								break;
000538  e04b              B        |L1.1490|
;;;328    				case 4:
;;;329    								M_IN1_HIGH;
00053a  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
00053e  49d3              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
000540  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;330    								M_IN2_HIGH;
000542  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000544  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;331    								M_IN3_LOW;
000546  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000548  49d5              LDR      r1,|L1.2208|
00054a  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;332    								M_IN4_HIGH;
00054c  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
000550  49d2              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
000552  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;333    								break;
000556  e03c              B        |L1.1490|
;;;334    				case 5:
;;;335    								M_IN1_HIGH;
000558  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
00055c  49cb              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
00055e  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;336    								M_IN2_HIGH;
000560  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000562  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;337    								M_IN3_LOW;
000564  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000566  49ce              LDR      r1,|L1.2208|
000568  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;338    								M_IN4_LOW;
00056a  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
00056e  49cb              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
000570  f8c10814          STR      r0,[r1,#0x814]
;;;339    								break;
000574  e02d              B        |L1.1490|
;;;340    				case 6:
;;;341    								M_IN1_HIGH;
000576  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
00057a  49c4              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
00057c  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;342    								M_IN2_HIGH;
00057e  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000580  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;343    								M_IN3_HIGH;
000582  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000584  49c4              LDR      r1,|L1.2200|
000586  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;344    								M_IN4_LOW;
000588  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
00058c  49c3              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
00058e  f8c10814          STR      r0,[r1,#0x814]
;;;345    								break;
000592  e01e              B        |L1.1490|
;;;346    				case 7:
;;;347    								M_IN1_LOW;
000594  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
000598  49bc              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
00059a  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;348    								M_IN2_HIGH;
00059c  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
00059e  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;349    								M_IN3_HIGH;
0005a0  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0005a2  49bd              LDR      r1,|L1.2200|
0005a4  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;350    								M_IN4_LOW;
0005a6  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
0005aa  49bc              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
0005ac  f8c10814          STR      r0,[r1,#0x814]
;;;351    								break;
0005b0  e00f              B        |L1.1490|
0005b2  e7ff              B        |L1.1460|
                  |L1.1460|
;;;352    				default:
;;;353    					      M_IN1_LOW;
0005b4  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
0005b8  49b4              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
0005ba  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;354    								M_IN2_LOW;
0005bc  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
0005be  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;355    								M_IN3_LOW;
0005c0  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0005c2  49b7              LDR      r1,|L1.2208|
0005c4  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;356    								M_IN4_LOW;
0005c6  f04f0010          MOV      r0,#0x10
0005ca  49b4              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
0005cc  f8c10814          STR      r0,[r1,#0x814]
;;;357    				        break;
0005d0  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1490|
0005d2  bf00              NOP                            ;309
;;;358    		}
;;;359    		if(step_state_init>0)
0005d4  48af              LDR      r0,|L1.2196|
0005d6  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_state_init
0005d8  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0005da  dd05              BLE      |L1.1512|
;;;360    		{
;;;361    			step_state_init--;
0005dc  48ad              LDR      r0,|L1.2196|
0005de  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_state_init
0005e0  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0005e2  49ac              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
0005e4  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; step_state_init
0005e6  e002              B        |L1.1518|
                  |L1.1512|
;;;362    		}
;;;363    		else
;;;364    		{
;;;365    			step_state_init = 7;
0005e8  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
0005ea  49aa              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
0005ec  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; step_state_init
                  |L1.1518|
;;;366    		}
;;;367    		delay_us(5000);
0005ee  f2413088          MOV      r0,#0x1388
0005f2  f7fffffe          BL       delay_us
                  |L1.1526|
0005f6  48ab              LDR      r0,|L1.2212|
0005f8  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]            ;300
0005fa  f0100f20          TST      r0,#0x20              ;300
0005fe  f47faf56          BNE      |L1.1198|
;;;368    	}
;;;369    	step_motor_position = 0;
000602  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000604  49a3              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
000606  3929              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x29
000608  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;370    	M_EN1_DISABLE;
00060a  f44f5080          MOV      r0,#0x1000
00060e  499f              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
000610  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;371    	M_EN2_DISABLE;
000612  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
000614  49a4              LDR      r1,|L1.2216|
000616  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;372    }
000618  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;373    void step_motor_out(void)
                          ENDP

                  step_motor_out PROC
00061a  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;374    {
;;;375    	
;;;376    	switch(step_motor_position)
00061c  489d              LDR      r0,|L1.2196|
00061e  3829              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x29
000620  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_motor_position
000622  b130              CBZ      r0,|L1.1586|
000624  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000626  d00a              BEQ      |L1.1598|
000628  2802              CMP      r0,#2
00062a  d00e              BEQ      |L1.1610|
00062c  2803              CMP      r0,#3
00062e  d10e              BNE      |L1.1614|
000630  e00c              B        |L1.1612|
                  |L1.1586|
;;;377    	{
;;;378    			case 0:
;;;379    				     motor_step_move(1700,0);
000632  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000634  f24060a4          MOV      r0,#0x6a4
000638  f7fffffe          BL       motor_step_move
;;;380    						 break;
00063c  e008              B        |L1.1616|
                  |L1.1598|
;;;381    			case 1:
;;;382    				     motor_step_move(1400,0);
00063e  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000640  f44f60af          MOV      r0,#0x578
000644  f7fffffe          BL       motor_step_move
;;;383    						 break;
000648  e002              B        |L1.1616|
                  |L1.1610|
;;;384    			case 2:
;;;385    				     
;;;386    						 break;
00064a  e001              B        |L1.1616|
                  |L1.1612|
;;;387    			case 3:
;;;388    				     
;;;389    						 break;
00064c  e000              B        |L1.1616|
                  |L1.1614|
;;;390    			default:
;;;391    						 break;
00064e  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1616|
000650  bf00              NOP                            ;380
;;;392      }
;;;393    	step_motor_position = 2;
000652  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000654  498f              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
000656  3929              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x29
000658  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;394    }
00065a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;395    void step_motor_in(void)
                          ENDP

                  step_motor_in PROC
00065c  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;396    {
;;;397    	switch(step_motor_position)
00065e  488d              LDR      r0,|L1.2196|
000660  3829              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x29
000662  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_motor_position
000664  b130              CBZ      r0,|L1.1652|
000666  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000668  d00a              BEQ      |L1.1664|
00066a  2802              CMP      r0,#2
00066c  d009              BEQ      |L1.1666|
00066e  2803              CMP      r0,#3
000670  d10e              BNE      |L1.1680|
000672  e00c              B        |L1.1678|
                  |L1.1652|
;;;398    	{
;;;399    			case 0:
;;;400    				     motor_step_move(300,0);
000674  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000676  f44f7096          MOV      r0,#0x12c
00067a  f7fffffe          BL       motor_step_move
;;;401    						 break;
00067e  e008              B        |L1.1682|
                  |L1.1664|
;;;402    			case 1:
;;;403    				     
;;;404    						 break;
000680  e007              B        |L1.1682|
                  |L1.1666|
;;;405    			case 2:
;;;406    				     motor_step_move(1400,1);
000682  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000684  f44f60af          MOV      r0,#0x578
000688  f7fffffe          BL       motor_step_move
;;;407    						 break;
00068c  e001              B        |L1.1682|
                  |L1.1678|
;;;408    			case 3:
;;;409    						 break;
00068e  e000              B        |L1.1682|
                  |L1.1680|
;;;410    			default:
;;;411    						 break;			
000690  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1682|
000692  bf00              NOP                            ;401
;;;412      }
;;;413    	step_motor_position = 1;
000694  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000696  497f              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
000698  3929              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x29
00069a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;414    }
00069c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;415    // void step_motor_out(void)
                          ENDP

                  get_co2_value PROC
;;;475    // }
;;;476    void get_co2_value(void)
00069e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;477    {
;;;478    	char i;
;;;479    	for(i=0;i<9;i++)
0006a0  e00c              B        |L1.1724|
                  |L1.1698|
;;;480    	{ 
;;;481    		while((USART1->SR&0X40)==0);
0006a2  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1700|
0006a4  4981              LDR      r1,|L1.2220|
0006a6  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]
0006a8  f0110f40          TST      r1,#0x40
0006ac  d0fa              BEQ      |L1.1700|
;;;482    		USART1->DR = get_CO2_CMD[i];
0006ae  4980              LDR      r1,|L1.2224|
0006b0  5c09              LDRB     r1,[r1,r0]
0006b2  4a80              LDR      r2,|L1.2228|
0006b4  8011              STRH     r1,[r2,#0]
0006b6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;479
0006ba  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1                 ;479
                  |L1.1724|
0006bc  2809              CMP      r0,#9                 ;479
0006be  dbf0              BLT      |L1.1698|
;;;483      }
;;;484    }
0006c0  4770              BX       lr
;;;485    
                          ENDP

                  power_off PROC
;;;492      static char start_delay_30_flag = 0;
;;;493    void power_off(void)
0006c2  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;494    {
;;;495    	bsp_LedOff(1);
0006c4  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0006c6  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOff
;;;496    	bsp_LedOff(2);
0006ca  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
0006cc  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOff
;;;497    	bsp_LedOff(3);
0006d0  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
0006d2  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOff
;;;498    	bsp_LedOff(4);
0006d6  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
0006d8  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOff
;;;499    	bsp_LedOff(5);
0006dc  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
0006de  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOff
;;;500    	bsp_LedOff(6);
0006e2  2006              MOVS     r0,#6
0006e4  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOff
;;;501    	bsp_LedOff(7);
0006e8  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
0006ea  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOff
;;;502    	bsp_LedOff(8);
0006ee  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
0006f0  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOff
;;;503    	
;;;504    	flag_CO_PW = 0;
0006f4  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0006f6  4970              LDR      r1,|L1.2232|
0006f8  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;505    	flag_PM_PW = 0;
0006fa  4970              LDR      r1,|L1.2236|
0006fc  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;506    	CO2_PW_DISABLE;
0006fe  f44f4000          MOV      r0,#0x8000
000702  4967              LDR      r1,|L1.2208|
000704  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;507    	TIM3->CCR2 = 0;
000706  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
00070a  f04f4180          MOV      r1,#0x40000000
00070e  f8a10438          STRH     r0,[r1,#0x438]
;;;508    	DC_MOTOR_DISABLE;
000712  f44f4080          MOV      r0,#0x4000
000716  496a              LDR      r1,|L1.2240|
000718  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
00071a  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00071e  4869              LDR      r0,|L1.2244|
000720  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_Cmd
;;;509    //	clear_screen();
;;;510    	Clear_LCD();
000724  f7fffffe          BL       Clear_LCD
;;;511    	clear_PM_rec();
000728  f7fffffe          BL       clear_PM_rec
;;;512    	flag_getCO2_value = 0;
00072c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00072e  4966              LDR      r1,|L1.2248|
000730  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;513    	flag_getPM_value = 0;
000732  4966              LDR      r1,|L1.2252|
000734  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;514    
;;;515    	timing_count = 0;
000736  4957              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
000738  3924              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x24
00073a  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; timing_count
;;;516    	timing_flag = 0;
00073c  1d09              ADDS     r1,r1,#4
00073e  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;517    	timing_time_min_value = 0;
000740  1d09              ADDS     r1,r1,#4
000742  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; timing_time_min_value
;;;518    	bsp_StopTimer(0);
000744  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StopTimer
;;;519    	bsp_StopTimer(1);
000748  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00074a  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StopTimer
;;;520    	
;;;521    	work_0_1_mode_state = 0;
00074e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000750  4950              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
000752  3917              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x17
000754  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;522    	mode_time_switch_flag = 0;
000756  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
000758  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;523    	mode_time_count =0;	
00075a  310c              ADDS     r1,r1,#0xc
00075c  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; mode_time_count
;;;524    	work_mode = 0;
00075e  390a              SUBS     r1,r1,#0xa
000760  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;525    	all_power_state = 0;
000762  1c89              ADDS     r1,r1,#2
000764  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;526    	//display_chang_face_flag = 0;
;;;527    	co2_pollute_flag = 0;
000766  1c89              ADDS     r1,r1,#2
000768  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;528    	PM2_5_pollute_flag = 0 ;
00076a  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1
00076c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;529    	power_on_init_time_flag = 0;
00076e  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1
000770  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;530    	
;;;531    	ANION_DISABLE;
000772  f44f7080          MOV      r0,#0x100
000776  4945              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
000778  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;532    	anion_PW_state = 0;
00077a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00077c  4945              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
00077e  391f              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x1f
000780  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;533    	pollute_flag_last = 0;
000782  3110              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x10
000784  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;534    	LCD_buffer[7] &= 0x07;//display_graphic_tree_clear();
000786  4852              LDR      r0,|L1.2256|
000788  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
00078a  f0000007          AND      r0,r0,#7
00078e  4950              LDR      r1,|L1.2256|
000790  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;535    	start_delay_30_flag = 0;
000792  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000794  493f              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
000796  3908              SUBS     r1,r1,#8
000798  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;536    	last_recycle_shut_flag = 0;
00079a  391f              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x1f
00079c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;537    }
00079e  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;538    
                          ENDP

                  main PROC
;;;542    
;;;543    int main(void)
0007a0  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;544    {
0007a2  b085              SUB      sp,sp,#0x14
;;;545    	
;;;546      static char dc_motor_speed_count = 0,air_dir_recycle_count=0,timing_state = 0;
;;;547    	static char last_dc_motor_speed_count = 0;
;;;548    	static char led_off_flag = 0;
;;;549    	RCC_ClocksTypeDef check_clock;
;;;550      uint8_t ucKeyCode;
;;;551    	char co2_crc_value = 0;
0007a4  bf00              NOP      
;;;552    	char co2_decode_count;
;;;553      sys();
0007a6  f7fffffe          BL       ||sys||
;;;554    	bsp_Init();
0007aa  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_Init
;;;555    
;;;556    	bsp_InitIRD();		/* 配置GPIO  */
0007ae  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_InitIRD
;;;557      GPIO_Configuration();
0007b2  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_Configuration
;;;558    	
;;;559    	CO2_CALIB_DISABLE;
0007b6  f44f4080          MOV      r0,#0x4000
0007ba  4946              LDR      r1,|L1.2260|
0007bc  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;560      ANION_DISABLE;
0007be  f44f7080          MOV      r0,#0x100
0007c2  4932              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
0007c4  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;561    	LCD_buffer[7] &= 0x07;//display_graphic_tree_clear();
0007c6  4842              LDR      r0,|L1.2256|
0007c8  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
0007ca  f0000007          AND      r0,r0,#7
0007ce  4940              LDR      r1,|L1.2256|
0007d0  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;562    	
;;;563    	PM_RST_DISABLE;
0007d2  f04f0040          MOV      r0,#0x40
0007d6  4931              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
0007d8  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;564    	PM_PW_DISABLE;
0007dc  f44f5080          MOV      r0,#0x1000
0007e0  492f              LDR      r1,|L1.2208|
0007e2  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;565    	CO2_PW_DISABLE;
0007e4  f44f4000          MOV      r0,#0x8000
0007e8  492c              LDR      r1,|L1.2204|
0007ea  f8c10814          STR      r0,[r1,#0x814]
;;;566    	DMA_ITConfig(DMA1_Channel6, DMA_IT_TC, DISABLE); 
0007ee  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
0007f2  f04f0102          MOV      r1,#2
0007f6  4838              LDR      r0,|L1.2264|
0007f8  f7fffffe          BL       DMA_ITConfig
;;;567    	//PM_PW_EN;
;;;568      TIM2_Configuration();
0007fc  f7fffffe          BL       TIM2_Configuration
;;;569    	USART_InitFun();
000800  f7fffffe          BL       USART_InitFun
;;;570    	NVIC_Configuration();
000804  f7fffffe          BL       NVIC_Configuration
;;;571    	IRD_StartWork();
000808  f7fffffe          BL       IRD_StartWork
;;;572    	RCC_GetClocksFreq(&check_clock);
00080c  4668              MOV      r0,sp
00080e  f7fffffe          BL       RCC_GetClocksFreq
;;;573    	bsp_InitLed();
000812  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_InitLed
;;;574    	//iic_init();
;;;575    
;;;576    	TIM3_Configuration();
000816  f7fffffe          BL       TIM3_Configuration
;;;577    	DC_MOTOR_DISABLE;
00081a  f44f4080          MOV      r0,#0x4000
00081e  4928              LDR      r1,|L1.2240|
000820  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
000822  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
000826  4827              LDR      r0,|L1.2244|
000828  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_Cmd
;;;578    //	motor_step_move(20000,0);
;;;579      Ht1621_Init();
00082c  f7fffffe          BL       Ht1621_Init
;;;580      M_EN1_DISABLE;
000830  f44f5080          MOV      r0,#0x1000
000834  4915              LDR      r1,|L1.2188|
000836  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;581    	M_EN2_DISABLE;
000838  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
00083a  f8c10414          STR      r0,[r1,#0x414]
;;;582    	clear_PM_rec();
00083e  f7fffffe          BL       clear_PM_rec
;;;583    	//display_graphic_33x64(display_S);
;;;584    	if((GPIOA->IDR & GPIO_Pin_5)!=0)	
000842  4818              LDR      r0,|L1.2212|
000844  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]
000846  f0100f20          TST      r0,#0x20
00084a  d001              BEQ      |L1.2128|
;;;585    	{
;;;586    		step_motor_init();//20161110 need del
00084c  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_init
                  |L1.2128|
;;;587    	}	
;;;588    	while (1)
000850  f001b98e          B.W      |L1.7024|
                  |L1.2132|
;;;589    	{
;;;590    		bsp_Idle();		/* 空闲时执行的函数,比如喂狗. 在bsp.c中 */
000854  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_Idle
;;;591    		
;;;592    		if(all_power_state==1)
000858  480e              LDR      r0,|L1.2196|
00085a  3814              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x14
00085c  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; all_power_state
00085e  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000860  d17e              BNE      |L1.2400|
;;;593    		{
;;;594    			
;;;595    							if(bsp_CheckTimer(3)==1)
000862  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
000864  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_CheckTimer
000868  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00086a  d102              BNE      |L1.2162|
;;;596    							{
;;;597    								start_delay_30_flag = 1;
00086c  4909              LDR      r1,|L1.2196|
00086e  3908              SUBS     r1,r1,#8
000870  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.2162|
;;;598    							}
;;;599    			
;;;600    							if(flag_getCO2_value==1&&shut_off_all_sensor==0&&start_delay_30_flag==1)
000872  4815              LDR      r0,|L1.2248|
000874  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; flag_getCO2_value
000876  2801              CMP      r0,#1
                  |L1.2168|
000878  d173              BNE      |L1.2402|
00087a  4818              LDR      r0,|L1.2268|
00087c  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; shut_off_all_sensor
00087e  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000880  d1fa              BNE      |L1.2168|
000882  4804              LDR      r0,|L1.2196|
000884  3808              SUBS     r0,r0,#8
000886  e02b              B        |L1.2272|
                  |L1.2184|
                          DCD      0x40000438
                  |L1.2188|

000afe  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;731    											  LCD_buffer[7] &= 0x0E;//display_graphic_led_clear();
000b00  4876              LDR      r0,|L1.3292|
000b02  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
000b04  f000000e          AND      r0,r0,#0xe
000b08  4974              LDR      r1,|L1.3292|
000b0a  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;732    											  LCD_buffer[7] |= 0x04;

000b0e  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
000b10  f0400004          ORR      r0,r0,#4
000b14  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
000b16  e027              B        |L1.2920|
                  |L1.2840|
;;;733    										}
;;;734    										else if(PM2_5_concentration.Buf16 > MID_LOW_PM2_5)
000b18  4874              LDR      r0,|L1.3308|
000b1a  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; PM2_5_concentration
000b1c  283c              CMP      r0,#0x3c
000b1e  dd10              BLE      |L1.2882|
;;;735    										{
;;;736    											  if(led_off_flag==0)
000b20  486d              LDR      r0,|L1.3288|
000b22  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; led_off_flag
000b24  b908              CBNZ     r0,|L1.2858|
;;;737    												{
;;;738    												  PM2_5_Yellow_Led();
000b26  f7fffffe          BL       PM2_5_Yellow_Led
                  |L1.2858|
;;;739    												}
;;;740    											  if(PM2_5_pollute_flag==1)
000b2a  486b              LDR      r0,|L1.3288|
000b2c  3819              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x19
000b2e  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; PM2_5_pollute_flag
000b30  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000b32  d119              BNE      |L1.2920|
;;;741    												{
;;;742    													LCD_buffer[7] |= 0x04;

000b36  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
000b38  f0400004          ORR      r0,r0,#4
000b3c  4967              LDR      r1,|L1.3292|
000b3e  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
000b40  e012              B        |L1.2920|
                  |L1.2882|
;;;743                            }
;;;744    											  //LCD_buffer[7] &= 0x0B;//display_graphic_led_clear();
;;;745    										}
;;;746    										else
;;;747    										{
;;;748    											  if(led_off_flag==0)

;;;749    												{
;;;750    												   PM2_5_Green_Led();

                  |L1.2892|
;;;751    												}
;;;752    												if(last_recycle_shut_flag==0)

;;;753    												{
;;;754    													PM2_5_pollute_flag = 0;

000b56  4960              LDR      r1,|L1.3288|
000b58  3919              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x19
000b5a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;755    													LCD_buffer[7] &= 0x0B;

000b5e  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer

000b64  495d              LDR      r1,|L1.3292|
000b66  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
                  |L1.2920|
;;;756    												}
;;;757    										}
;;;758    										clear_PM_rec();

;;;759    										flag_getPM_value = 0;

000b6e  495d              LDR      r1,|L1.3300|
000b70  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.2930|
;;;760    							}
;;;761    							if(PM2_5_pollute_flag==0&&co2_pollute_flag==0&&shut_off_all_sensor==0)

000b74  3819              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x19
000b76  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; PM2_5_pollute_flag

000b7a  4857              LDR      r0,|L1.3288|
000b7c  381a              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x1a
000b7e  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; co2_pollute_flag
000b80  b940              CBNZ     r0,|L1.2964|
000b82  4859              LDR      r0,|L1.3304|
000b84  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; shut_off_all_sensor
000b86  b928              CBNZ     r0,|L1.2964|
;;;762    							{
;;;763    								LCD_buffer[7] |= 0x01;

000b8a  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
000b8c  f0400001          ORR      r0,r0,#1
000b90  4952              LDR      r1,|L1.3292|
000b92  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
                  |L1.2964|
;;;764    							}
;;;765    							if((LCD_buffer[7]&0x07)==0&&led_off_flag==0&&shut_off_all_sensor==0)

000b96  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer

000b9c  d10b              BNE      |L1.2998|

000ba0  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; led_off_flag

000ba4  4850              LDR      r0,|L1.3304|
000ba6  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; shut_off_all_sensor
000ba8  b928              CBNZ     r0,|L1.2998|
;;;766    							{
;;;767    								LCD_buffer[7] |= 0x01;

000bac  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
000bae  f0400001          ORR      r0,r0,#1
000bb2  494a              LDR      r1,|L1.3292|
000bb4  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
                  |L1.2998|
;;;768    							}
;;;769    							
;;;770    							if(timing_flag==1)

000bb8  3828              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x28

000bbc  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000bbe  d117              BNE      |L1.3056|
;;;771    							{
;;;772    										if(bsp_CheckTimer(0))
000bc0  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000bc2  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_CheckTimer
000bc6  b148              CBZ      r0,|L1.3036|
;;;773    										{
;;;774    											timing_count++;

000bca  382c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x2c
000bcc  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; timing_count
000bce  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
000bd0  4941              LDR      r1,|L1.3288|
000bd2  392c              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x2c
000bd4  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; timing_count
;;;775    											power_on_init_time_flag = 1;

000bd8  3114              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x14
000bda  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.3036|
;;;776    										}
;;;777    										if(timing_count>=timing_time_min_value)

000be0  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; timing_count
000be2  493d              LDR      r1,|L1.3288|
000be4  3924              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x24
000be6  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]  ; timing_time_min_value
000be8  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000bea  db01              BLT      |L1.3056|
;;;778    										{
;;;779    											 power_off();
000bec  f7fffffe          BL       power_off
                  |L1.3056|
;;;780    										}
;;;781    							}
;;;782    							
;;;783    							if(mode_time_switch_flag)

000bf8  d069              BEQ      |L1.3278|
;;;784    							{
;;;785    								  if((co2_pollute_flag == 0)&&(PM2_5_pollute_flag == 0))

000bfe  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; co2_pollute_flag
000c00  2800              CMP      r0,#0
                  |L1.3074|
000c02  d179              BNE      |L1.3320|
000c04  4834              LDR      r0,|L1.3288|
000c06  3819              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x19
000c08  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; PM2_5_pollute_flag
000c0a  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000c0c  d1f9              BNE      |L1.3074|
;;;786    									{
;;;787    																if(bsp_CheckTimer(1))

;;;788    																{
;;;789    																	mode_time_count++;

000c1c  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1

000c22  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; mode_time_count
                  |L1.3108|
;;;790    																}
;;;791    																if(work_mode==0)//auto

;;;792    																{
;;;793    																	switch(work_0_1_mode_state)

000c32  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; work_0_1_mode_state
000c34  b120              CBZ      r0,|L1.3136|
000c36  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000c38  d05f              BEQ      |L1.3322|
000c3a  2802              CMP      r0,#2
000c3c  d146              BNE      |L1.3276|
000c3e  e0a1              B        |L1.3460|
                  |L1.3136|
;;;794    																	{
;;;795    																		
;;;796    																		 case 0:
;;;797    																					 if(mode_time_count>=3||pollute_flag_last==1)

000c48  da04              BGE      |L1.3156|
000c4a  4823              LDR      r0,|L1.3288|
000c4c  3817              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x17

                  |L1.3156|
;;;798    																					 {
;;;799    																						  pollute_flag_last = 0;

;;;800    																							work_0_1_mode_state = 1;

;;;801    																							mode_time_count =0;

;;;807    																									dc_motor_speed_count = 2;

;;;808                                                  }
;;;809    																							dc_motor_speed_count = 2;
000c8c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;810    																							
;;;811    																						  //if(display_chang_face_flag==0)
;;;812    																							{
;;;813    																							   //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_out_dir);
;;;814    																								LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;

000c90  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer

000c96  4911              LDR      r1,|L1.3292|

;;;815    																								LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x02;

;;;816    																							}
;;;817

                  |L1.3278|
000cce  e1c1              B        |L1.4180|
                  |L1.3280|

                  |L1.3288|

                  |L1.3292|
                          DCD      LCD_buffer
                  |L1.3296|

                  |L1.3300|
                          DCD      flag_getPM_value
                  |L1.3304|
                          DCD      shut_off_all_sensor
                  |L1.3308|
                          DCD      PM2_5_concentration
                  |L1.3312|
                          DCD      0x40000438
                  |L1.3316|
                          DCD      0x40011000
                  |L1.3320|
000cf8  e16c              B        |L1.4052|
                  |L1.3322|
;;;829    																		case 1:
;;;830    																					 if(mode_time_count>=2||pollute_flag_last==1)
000cfa  48fc              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
000cfc  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; mode_time_count
000cfe  2802              CMP      r0,#2
000d00  da04              BGE      |L1.3340|
000d02  48fa              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
000d04  1ec0              SUBS     r0,r0,#3

000d0a  d13a              BNE      |L1.3458|
                  |L1.3340|
;;;831    																					 {
;;;832    																						 pollute_flag_last = 0;

;;;834    																							mode_time_count =0;

000d1e  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; mode_time_count

;;;836    																							dc_motor_speed_count = 4;

                  |L1.3372|

                  |L1.3374|

;;;838    																									//display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_no_speed);

;;;840    																									LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x00;

;;;841                                                   }
;;;842    																								
;;;843    																						  //if(display_chang_face_flag==0)
;;;844    																							{
;;;845    																							   //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_out_dir);
;;;846    																								LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;

000d4e  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;847    																								LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x02;

;;;848    																							}
;;;849    
;;;850    																							{
;;;851    																								ANION_DISABLE;

;;;852    																								anion_PW_state = 0;

000d68  f1a10113          SUB      r1,r1,#0x13
000d6c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;853    																								LCD_buffer[7] &= 0x07;//display_graphic_tree_clear();
000d6e  48e1              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
000d70  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
000d72  f0000007          AND      r0,r0,#7
000d76  49df              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
000d78  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;854    																							}
;;;855    																							Refresh_LCD();
000d7a  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
;;;856    																							step_motor_out();
000d7e  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_out
                  |L1.3458|
;;;857    																							
;;;858    																					 }
;;;859    																					 break;
000d82  e044              B        |L1.3598|
                  |L1.3460|
;;;860    																		case 2:							     
;;;861    																					 if(mode_time_count>=1||pollute_flag_last==1)
000d84  48d9              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
000d86  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; mode_time_count
000d88  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000d8a  da04              BGE      |L1.3478|
000d8c  48d7              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
000d8e  1ec0              SUBS     r0,r0,#3
000d90  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; pollute_flag_last
000d92  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000d94  d13a              BNE      |L1.3596|
                  |L1.3478|
;;;862    																					 {
;;;863    																						  pollute_flag_last = 0;
000d96  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000d98  49d4              LDR      r1,|L1.4332|
000d9a  1ec9              SUBS     r1,r1,#3
000d9c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;864    																							work_0_1_mode_state = 0;
000d9e  3908              SUBS     r1,r1,#8
000da0  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;865    																							mode_time_count =0;	
000da2  310b              ADDS     r1,r1,#0xb
000da4  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; mode_time_count
;;;866                                                  {		
;;;867                                                      start_motor();																								
000da6  f7fffffe          BL       start_motor
;;;868    																									TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_MID_SPEED;//48;	
000daa  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
000dac  49d0              LDR      r1,|L1.4336|
000dae  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;869    																								 //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_mid_speed);
;;;870    																									LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
000db0  48d0              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
000db2  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
000db4  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
000db8  49ce              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
000dba  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;871    																									LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x0C;
000dbc  f04f000c          MOV      r0,#0xc
000dc0  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;872    																									dc_motor_speed_count = 2;
000dc2  f04f0002          MOV      r0,#2
000dc6  49c9              LDR      r1,|L1.4332|
000dc8  f1010110          ADD      r1,r1,#0x10
000dcc  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;873                                                  }
;;;874    																							
;;;875    																						  //if(display_chang_face_flag==0)
;;;876    																							{
;;;877    																							   LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;//display_graphic_win_dir_39x56(display_in_dir);
000dce  48c9              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
000dd0  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
000dd2  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
000dd6  49c7              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
000dd8  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;878                                                     LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x03;																						
000dda  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000ddc  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
000dde  f0400003          ORR      r0,r0,#3
000de2  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;879    																							}
;;;880    
;;;881    																							{
;;;882    																								ANION_EN;
000de4  f44f7080          MOV      r0,#0x100
000de8  49c3              LDR      r1,|L1.4344|
000dea  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;883    																								anion_PW_state = 1;
000dec  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
000df0  49be              LDR      r1,|L1.4332|
000df2  f1a10113          SUB      r1,r1,#0x13
000df6  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;884    																								LCD_buffer[7] |= 0x08;//display_graphic_tree_32x64(display_tree);
000df8  48be              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
000dfa  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
000dfc  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
000e00  49bc              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
000e02  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;885    																							}
;;;886    
;;;887                                                  Refresh_LCD();	
000e04  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
;;;888                                                  step_motor_in();																							
000e08  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_in
                  |L1.3596|
;;;889    																					 }										 
;;;890    																					 break;
000e0c  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.3598|
000e0e  e153              B        |L1.4280|
                  |L1.3600|
;;;891    																	}
;;;892    																	
;;;893    																}
;;;894    																else if(work_mode==1||work_mode==2)
000e10  48b6              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
000e12  380a              SUBS     r0,r0,#0xa
000e14  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; work_mode
000e16  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000e18  d004              BEQ      |L1.3620|
000e1a  48b4              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
000e1c  380a              SUBS     r0,r0,#0xa
000e1e  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; work_mode
000e20  2802              CMP      r0,#2
000e22  d1f4              BNE      |L1.3598|
                  |L1.3620|
;;;895    																{
;;;896    																		switch(work_0_1_mode_state)
000e24  48b1              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
000e26  380b              SUBS     r0,r0,#0xb
000e28  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; work_0_1_mode_state
000e2a  b120              CBZ      r0,|L1.3638|
000e2c  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000e2e  d047              BEQ      |L1.3776|
000e30  2802              CMP      r0,#2
000e32  d144              BNE      |L1.3774|
000e34  e088              B        |L1.3912|
                  |L1.3638|
;;;897    																		{
;;;898    																			case 0:										 
;;;899    																						 if(mode_time_count>=3||pollute_flag_last==1)
000e36  48ad              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
000e38  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; mode_time_count
000e3a  2803              CMP      r0,#3
000e3c  da04              BGE      |L1.3656|
000e3e  48ab              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
000e40  1ec0              SUBS     r0,r0,#3
000e42  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; pollute_flag_last
000e44  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000e46  d13a              BNE      |L1.3774|
                  |L1.3656|
;;;900    																						 {
;;;901    																							  pollute_flag_last = 0;

;;;903    																								mode_time_count =0;

;;;909                                                    }
;;;910    																								dc_motor_speed_count = 3;

000e7e  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;911    																								
;;;912    																								//if(display_chang_face_flag==0)
;;;913    																								{
;;;914    																									 //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_out_dir);
;;;915    																									LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;

000e88  499a              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
000e8a  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;916    																									LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x02;

000e8e  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
000e90  f0400002          ORR      r0,r0,#2
000e94  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;917    																								}
;;;918    																								
;;;919    																								{
;;;920    																									ANION_EN;

000e9a  4997              LDR      r1,|L1.4344|
000e9c  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;921    																									anion_PW_state = 1;
000e9e  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
000ea2  4992              LDR      r1,|L1.4332|
000ea4  f1a10113          SUB      r1,r1,#0x13
000ea8  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;922    																									LCD_buffer[7] |= 0x08;//display_graphic_tree_32x64(display_tree);

000eac  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
000eae  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
000eb2  4990              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
000eb4  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;923    																								}
;;;924    
;;;925    																								Refresh_LCD();

;;;926    																								step_motor_out();
000eba  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_out
                  |L1.3774|
;;;927    																								//display_graphic_33x64(display_A);
;;;928    																						 }										 
;;;929    																						 break;
000ebe  e088              B        |L1.4050|
                  |L1.3776|
;;;930    																			case 1:										 
;;;931    																						 if(mode_time_count>=2||pollute_flag_last==1)

000ec2  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; mode_time_count
000ec4  2802              CMP      r0,#2

                  |L1.3794|
;;;932    																						 {

000efa  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;941                                                    }
;;;942    																								dc_motor_speed_count = 4;

;;;946    																									 //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_out_dir);

000f12  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]

;;;949    																								}

;;;953    																									anion_PW_state = 0;

;;;954    																									LCD_buffer[7] &= 0x07;//display_graphic_tree_clear();

;;;955    																								}

;;;957    																								step_motor_out();

                  |L1.3910|
;;;958    																						 }
;;;959    																						 break;
000f46  e044              B        |L1.4050|
                  |L1.3912|
;;;960    																		case 2:							     
;;;961    																						 if(mode_time_count>=1||pollute_flag_last==1)

;;;972                                                    }
;;;973    																								dc_motor_speed_count = 3;

;;;988                                                    step_motor_in();

                  |L1.4048|
;;;989    																						 }

000fd0  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.4050|

                  |L1.4052|
;;;991    																		}
;;;992    																}
;;;993    											}// if(PM2_5_pollute_flag = 0&&PM2_5_pollute_flag = 0)
;;;994    											else 
;;;995    											{
;;;996    												if(shut_off_all_sensor==0)
000fd4  4849              LDR      r0,|L1.4348|
000fd6  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; shut_off_all_sensor
000fd8  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000fda  d16d              BNE      |L1.4280|
;;;997    												{
;;;998    													pollute_flag_last = 1;
000fdc  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000fde  4943              LDR      r1,|L1.4332|
000fe0  1ec9              SUBS     r1,r1,#3
000fe2  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;999    													if(co2_pollute_flag==1)
000fe4  1ec8              SUBS     r0,r1,#3
000fe6  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; co2_pollute_flag
000fe8  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000fea  d134              BNE      |L1.4182|
;;;1000   													{
;;;1001   														  
;;;1002   															
;;;1003   															 if(display_chang_face_flag==0)
000fec  1f08              SUBS     r0,r1,#4
000fee  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; display_chang_face_flag
000ff0  b950              CBNZ     r0,|L1.4104|
;;;1004   															{
;;;1005   														     //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_out_dir);
;;;1006   																 LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;
000ff2  4840              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
000ff4  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
000ff6  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
000ffa  493e              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
000ffc  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1007   																 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x02;
000ffe  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001000  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
001002  f0400002          ORR      r0,r0,#2
001006  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
                  |L1.4104|
;;;1008   															}
;;;1009   															
;;;1010   															if(work_mode==0)
001008  4838              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
00100a  380a              SUBS     r0,r0,#0xa
00100c  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; work_mode
00100e  b960              CBNZ     r0,|L1.4138|
;;;1011   															{
;;;1012   														      TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_HIGH_SPEED;//48;
001010  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
001012  4937              LDR      r1,|L1.4336|
001014  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1013   																  //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_high_speed);
;;;1014   																	LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
001016  4837              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
001018  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
00101a  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
00101e  4935              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
001020  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1015   																	LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x0E;
001022  f04f000e          MOV      r0,#0xe
001026  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
001028  e00b              B        |L1.4162|
                  |L1.4138|
;;;1016   															}
;;;1017   															else
;;;1018   															{
;;;1019   																  TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_MID_SPEED;//48;
00102a  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
00102c  4930              LDR      r1,|L1.4336|
00102e  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1020   																  //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_mid_speed);
;;;1021   																	LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
001030  4830              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
001032  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
001034  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
001038  492e              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
00103a  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1022   																	LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x0C;
00103c  f04f000c          MOV      r0,#0xc
001040  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
                  |L1.4162|
;;;1023                                 }
;;;1024   															if(step_motor_position!=2)
001042  482a              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
001044  381d              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x1d
001046  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_motor_position
001048  2802              CMP      r0,#2
00104a  d035              BEQ      |L1.4280|
;;;1025   															{
;;;1026   																Refresh_LCD();
00104c  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
;;;1027   																step_motor_out() ;
001050  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_out
                  |L1.4180|
001054  e030              B        |L1.4280|
                  |L1.4182|
;;;1028   															}
;;;1029   													}
;;;1030   													else
;;;1031   													{
;;;1032   														  
;;;1033   //														// if(display_chang_face_flag==0)
;;;1034   															{
;;;1035   																 //display_graphic_win_dir_39x56(display_in_dir);
;;;1036   																 LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;
001056  4827              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
001058  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
00105a  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
00105e  4925              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
001060  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1037   																 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x03;
001062  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001064  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
001066  f0400003          ORR      r0,r0,#3
00106a  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1038   														     
;;;1039   															}
;;;1040   															
;;;1041   															if(work_mode==0)
00106c  481f              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
00106e  380a              SUBS     r0,r0,#0xa
001070  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; work_mode
001072  b960              CBNZ     r0,|L1.4238|
;;;1042   															{
;;;1043   														      TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_HIGH_SPEED;//48;
001074  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
001076  491e              LDR      r1,|L1.4336|
001078  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1044   																  //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_high_speed);
;;;1045   																	LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
00107a  481e              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
00107c  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
00107e  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
001082  491c              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
001084  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1046   																	LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x0E;
001086  f04f000e          MOV      r0,#0xe
00108a  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
00108c  e00b              B        |L1.4262|
                  |L1.4238|
;;;1047   															}
;;;1048   															else
;;;1049   															{
;;;1050   																  TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_MID_SPEED;//48;
00108e  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
001090  4917              LDR      r1,|L1.4336|
001092  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1051   																  //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_mid_speed);
;;;1052   																	LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
001094  4817              LDR      r0,|L1.4340|
001096  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
001098  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
00109c  4915              LDR      r1,|L1.4340|
00109e  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1053   																	LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x0C;
0010a0  f04f000c          MOV      r0,#0xc
0010a4  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
                  |L1.4262|
;;;1054                                 }
;;;1055   															if(step_motor_position!=1)
0010a6  4811              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
0010a8  381d              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x1d
0010aa  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_motor_position
0010ac  2801              CMP      r0,#1
0010ae  d003              BEQ      |L1.4280|
;;;1056   															{
;;;1057   																	Refresh_LCD();
0010b0  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
;;;1058   																	step_motor_in();
0010b4  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_in
                  |L1.4280|
;;;1059   															}
;;;1060   															
;;;1061   													}
;;;1062                         }
;;;1063   										}//if(shut_off_all_sensor==0)
;;;1064   							}//if(mode_time_switch_flag)
;;;1065   							
;;;1066   							if(power_on_init_time_flag==1)
0010b8  480c              LDR      r0,|L1.4332|
0010ba  1f00              SUBS     r0,r0,#4
0010bc  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; power_on_init_time_flag
0010be  2801              CMP      r0,#1
0010c0  d101              BNE      |L1.4294|
;;;1067   							{
;;;1068   								  flag_CO_PW = 1;
0010c2  490f              LDR      r1,|L1.4352|
0010c4  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.4294|
;;;1069                 }
;;;1070   	   }//if(all_power_state==1)
;;;1071   		/* 按键滤波和检测由后台systick中断服务程序实现，我们只需要调用bsp_GetKey读取键值即可。 */
;;;1072   		ucKeyCode = bsp_GetKey();	/* 读取键值, 无键按下时返回 KEY_NONE = 0 */

0010ca  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1073   		#ifdef debug
;;;1074   // 		if(keys_show[keys_show_count]!=ucKeyCode&&ucKeyCode!=0)
;;;1075   // 		{
;;;1076   // 			if(keys_show_count<30)
;;;1077   // 			keys_show_count++;
;;;1078   // 			keys_show[keys_show_count] = ucKeyCode;//0xc6 0xc4 0xc0 0xc3  0x89 0x87
;;;1079   //     }
;;;1080   		#endif
;;;1081   		if (ucKeyCode != KEY_NONE)
0010cc  2c00              CMP      r4,#0
0010ce  d07e              BEQ      |L1.4558|
;;;1082   		{
;;;1083   			switch (ucKeyCode)
0010d0  2c87              CMP      r4,#0x87
0010d2  d07d              BEQ      |L1.4560|
0010d4  dc1b              BGT      |L1.4366|
0010d6  2c0a              CMP      r4,#0xa
0010d8  d07b              BEQ      |L1.4562|
0010da  dc13              BGT      |L1.4356|
0010dc  2c01              CMP      r4,#1
0010de  d023              BEQ      |L1.4392|
0010e0  2c04              CMP      r4,#4
0010e2  d077              BEQ      |L1.4564|
0010e4  2c07              CMP      r4,#7
                  |L1.4326|
0010e6  d176              BNE      |L1.4566|
0010e8  e248              B        |L1.5500|
0010ea  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.4332|
                          DCD      ||.data||+0x38
                  |L1.4336|
                          DCD      0x40000438
                  |L1.4340|
                          DCD      LCD_buffer
                  |L1.4344|
                          DCD      0x40011000
                  |L1.4348|
                          DCD      shut_off_all_sensor
                  |L1.4352|
                          DCD      flag_CO_PW
                  |L1.4356|
001104  2c0d              CMP      r4,#0xd
001106  d067              BEQ      |L1.4568|
001108  2c10              CMP      r4,#0x10
00110a  d1ec              BNE      |L1.4326|
00110c  e3fe              B        |L1.6412|
                  |L1.4366|
00110e  2cc3              CMP      r4,#0xc3
001110  d07e              BEQ      |L1.4624|
001112  dc04              BGT      |L1.4382|
001114  2c89              CMP      r4,#0x89
001116  d07c              BEQ      |L1.4626|
001118  2cc0              CMP      r4,#0xc0
00111a  d1e4              BNE      |L1.4326|
00111c  e22d              B        |L1.5498|
                  |L1.4382|
00111e  2cc4              CMP      r4,#0xc4
001120  d078              BEQ      |L1.4628|
001122  2cc6              CMP      r4,#0xc6
001124  d1df              BNE      |L1.4326|
;;;1084   			{
;;;1085   
;;;1086   				case IR_KEY_POWER:  //power 0xC6  
;;;1087   				case KEY_DOWN_K1:			/* 主板K1键按下 */

                  |L1.4392|
;;;1088                               speak_one_time();

;;;1089   				                    if(all_power_state==0x0000)

001132  d170              BNE      |L1.4630|
;;;1090   														{
;;;1091   																 bsp_LedOn(7);

;;;1092                                    bsp_LedOn(8);

00113c  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOn
;;;1093   															   //clear_screen();
;;;1094   															
;;;1095   															   pollute_flag_last = 0;

001142  49fa              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
001144  1d49              ADDS     r1,r1,#5
001146  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1096   																 shut_off_all_sensor = 0;
001148  49f9              LDR      r1,|L1.5424|
00114a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1097   																 //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_in_dir);
;;;1098   															   LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;
00114c  48f9              LDR      r0,|L1.5428|
00114e  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
001150  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
001154  49f7              LDR      r1,|L1.5428|
001156  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1099   																 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x03;

00115a  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
00115c  f0400003          ORR      r0,r0,#3
001160  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1100   																 //display_graphic_33x64(display_A);
;;;1101   															   LCD_buffer[0]  = 0x09;
001162  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
001164  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1102   																 mode_time_switch_flag = 1;
001166  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001168  49f0              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
00116a  1f09              SUBS     r1,r1,#4
00116c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1103   															   
;;;1104   															   //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_mid_speed);
;;;1105   															   LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//speed led

001170  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
001172  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
001176  49ef              LDR      r1,|L1.5428|
001178  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1106   															   LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x0C;//speed led
00117a  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
00117c  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;1107   																 bsp_StartAutoTimer(1,60000);
00117e  f64e2160          MOV      r1,#0xea60
001182  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001184  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StartAutoTimer
;;;1108   																// flag_CO_PW = 1;
;;;1109   																	CO2_PW_EN;

00118e  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1110   															    co2_Green_Led();

;;;1111   																	flag_PM_PW = 1;	
001194  2001              MOVS     r0,#1

001198  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1112   															    LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x08;//speed led
00119a  48e6              LDR      r0,|L1.5428|
00119c  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer
00119e  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
0011a2  49e4              LDR      r1,|L1.5428|
0011a4  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1113   																  manul_flag = 0;

0011a8  49e0              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
0011aa  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0011ac  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1114   															    work_mode = 0;
