0011b0  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1115   															  
;;;1116   															   timing_flag = 0;
0011b2  390a              SUBS     r1,r1,#0xa
0011b4  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1117   															   timing_state = 5;
0011b6  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
0011b8  3126              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x26
0011ba  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1118   																 //bsp_StartAutoTimer(0,60000);
;;;1119   															   //timing_time_min_value = 120;
;;;1120   																  //display_graphic_27x64_single(display_time_2);
;;;1121   																 LCD_buffer[3]  = 0x0F;//speed led
0011bc  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
0011be  49dd              LDR      r1,|L1.5428|
0011c0  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]
;;;1122   																 LCD_buffer[4]  = 0x0D;//speed led
0011c2  200d              MOVS     r0,#0xd
0011c4  7108              STRB     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;1123   																 LCD_buffer[5]  = 0x0F;//speed led
0011c6  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
0011c8  7148              STRB     r0,[r1,#5]
;;;1124   																 LCD_buffer[6] &= 0x08;//speed led
0011ca  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0011cc  e005              B        |L1.4570|
                  |L1.4558|
0011ce  e3f9              B        |L1.6596|
                  |L1.4560|
0011d0  e3f9              B        |L1.6598|
                  |L1.4562|
0011d2  e2a1              B        |L1.5912|
                  |L1.4564|
0011d4  e065              B        |L1.4770|
                  |L1.4566|
0011d6  e3f7              B        |L1.6600|
                  |L1.4568|
0011d8  e3da              B        |L1.6544|
                  |L1.4570|
0011da  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer
0011dc  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
0011e0  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1125   																 LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x05;//speed led
0011e2  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0011e4  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer
0011e6  f0400005          ORR      r0,r0,#5
0011ea  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1126   																 
;;;1127   // 																 LCD_buffer[3]  = 0x00;//speed led
;;;1128   // 																 LCD_buffer[4]  = 0x08;//speed led
;;;1129   // 																 LCD_buffer[5]  = 0x0D;//speed led
;;;1130   // 																 LCD_buffer[6] &= 0x08;//speed led
;;;1131   // 																 LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x03;//speed led
;;;1132   																 clear_PM_rec();
0011ec  f7fffffe          BL       clear_PM_rec
;;;1133   																 flag_getCO2_value = 0;
0011f0  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0011f2  49d3              LDR      r1,|L1.5440|
0011f4  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1134   	                               flag_getPM_value = 0;
0011f6  49d3              LDR      r1,|L1.5444|
0011f8  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1135   															
;;;1136   															    ANION_EN;
0011fa  f44f7080          MOV      r0,#0x100
0011fe  49d2              LDR      r1,|L1.5448|
001200  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;1137   																	anion_PW_state = 1;
001202  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001204  49c9              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
001206  390b              SUBS     r1,r1,#0xb
001208  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1138   																	//display_graphic_tree_32x64(display_tree);
;;;1139   		                             	LCD_buffer[7] |= 0x08;

00120c  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
00120e  e003              B        |L1.4632|
                  |L1.4624|
001210  e283              B        |L1.5914|
                  |L1.4626|
001212  e3be              B        |L1.6546|
                  |L1.4628|
001214  e046              B        |L1.4772|
                  |L1.4630|
001216  e02f              B        |L1.4728|
                  |L1.4632|
001218  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
00121c  49c5              LDR      r1,|L1.5428|
00121e  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;1140                                    
;;;1141   																 bsp_StartTimer(3,30000);//led start question
001220  f2475130          MOV      r1,#0x7530
001224  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
001226  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StartTimer
;;;1142   																 PM2_5_Green_Led();
00122a  f7fffffe          BL       PM2_5_Green_Led
;;;1143   																 co2_Green_Led();
00122e  f7fffffe          BL       co2_Green_Led
;;;1144   																 
;;;1145                                   Refresh_LCD();															 
001232  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
;;;1146                                   step_motor_in();																	
001236  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_in
;;;1147   																all_power_state = 1;
00123a  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00123c  49bb              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
00123e  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1148   																DC_MOTOR_EN;
001240  f44f40c0          MOV      r0,#0x6000
001244  f04f4180          MOV      r1,#0x40000000
001248  f8a10418          STRH     r0,[r1,#0x418]
00124c  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00124e  48bf              LDR      r0,|L1.5452|
001250  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_CtrlPWMOutputs
001254  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
001256  48bd              LDR      r0,|L1.5452|
001258  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_Cmd
;;;1149   																start_motor();
00125c  f7fffffe          BL       start_motor
;;;1150   																 TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_MID_SPEED;//48;
001260  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
001262  49bb              LDR      r1,|L1.5456|
001264  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1151   															   dc_motor_speed_count = 1;
001266  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
00126a  49b0              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
00126c  f1010118          ADD      r1,r1,#0x18
001270  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1152   																flag_CO_PW = 1;
001272  49b8              LDR      r1,|L1.5460|
001274  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
001276  e013              B        |L1.4768|
                  |L1.4728|
;;;1153   																
;;;1154   														}
;;;1155   														else
;;;1156   														{
;;;1157   															  LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;
001278  48ae              LDR      r0,|L1.5428|
00127a  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
00127c  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
001280  49ac              LDR      r1,|L1.5428|
001282  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1158   																LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x03;
001284  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001286  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
001288  f0400003          ORR      r0,r0,#3
00128c  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1159   															  Refresh_LCD();
00128e  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
;;;1160   															  step_motor_in();
001292  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_in
;;;1161   																power_off();
001296  f7fffffe          BL       power_off
;;;1162   																all_power_state = 0;
00129a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00129c  49a3              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
00129e  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.4768|
;;;1163   																//DMA_ITConfig(DMA1_Channel6, DMA_IT_TC, ENABLE);
;;;1164   														}
;;;1165   														
;;;1166   				                  	break;
0012a0  e239              B        |L1.5910|
                  |L1.4770|
;;;1167   
;;;1168   				case KEY_DOWN_K2:			/* 主板K2键按下 */
;;;1169   				case IR_KEY_MODE://0xc4
0012a2  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.4772|
;;;1170   					                  
;;;1171   														if(all_power_state==1&&step_motor_moving_flag==0&&last_recycle_shut_flag == 0)
0012a4  48a1              LDR      r0,|L1.5420|
0012a6  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; all_power_state
0012a8  2801              CMP      r0,#1
                  |L1.4778|
0012aa  d17d              BNE      |L1.5032|
0012ac  489f              LDR      r0,|L1.5420|
0012ae  3814              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x14
0012b0  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; step_motor_moving_flag
0012b2  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0012b4  d1f9              BNE      |L1.4778|
0012b6  489d              LDR      r0,|L1.5420|
0012b8  3813              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x13
0012ba  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; last_recycle_shut_flag
0012bc  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0012be  d1f4              BNE      |L1.4778|
;;;1172   														{	
;;;1173   																	
;;;1174   //       															{
;;;1175   // 																			flag_PM_PW = 1;
;;;1176   //                                       LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x08;//speed led																			
;;;1177   // 																	    flag_CO_PW = 1;
;;;1178   // 																	    CO2_PW_EN;
;;;1179   // 																		}
;;;1180   															
;;;1181   															    speak_one_time();
0012c0  f7fffffe          BL       speak_one_time
;;;1182   															
;;;1183   															    if(work_mode<3)
0012c4  4899              LDR      r0,|L1.5420|
0012c6  1e80              SUBS     r0,r0,#2
0012c8  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; work_mode
0012ca  2803              CMP      r0,#3
0012cc  da07              BGE      |L1.4830|
;;;1184   																	{
;;;1185   																		work_mode++;
0012ce  4897              LDR      r0,|L1.5420|
0012d0  1e80              SUBS     r0,r0,#2
0012d2  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; work_mode
0012d4  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0012d6  4995              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
0012d8  1e89              SUBS     r1,r1,#2
0012da  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
0012dc  e003              B        |L1.4838|
                  |L1.4830|
;;;1186   																	}
;;;1187   																	else
;;;1188   																	{
;;;1189   																		work_mode = 0;
0012de  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0012e0  4992              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
0012e2  1e89              SUBS     r1,r1,#2
0012e4  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.4838|
;;;1190   																	}
;;;1191   																	
;;;1192   																	if(manul_flag==1)
0012e6  4891              LDR      r0,|L1.5420|
0012e8  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0012ea  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; manul_flag
0012ec  2801              CMP      r0,#1
0012ee  d107              BNE      |L1.4864|
;;;1193   																	{
;;;1194   																		manul_flag = 0;
0012f0  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0012f2  498e              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
0012f4  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0012f6  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1195   																		work_mode = 0;
0012f8  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0012fa  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1196   																		last_recycle_shut_flag = 0;
0012fc  3911              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x11
0012fe  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.4864|
;;;1197   																	}
;;;1198   																	switch(work_mode)
001300  488a              LDR      r0,|L1.5420|
001302  1e80              SUBS     r0,r0,#2
001304  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; work_mode
001306  b130              CBZ      r0,|L1.4886|
001308  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00130a  d052              BEQ      |L1.5042|
00130c  2802              CMP      r0,#2
00130e  d07d              BEQ      |L1.5132|
001310  2803              CMP      r0,#3
001312  d17c              BNE      |L1.5134|
001314  e0ba              B        |L1.5260|
                  |L1.4886|
;;;1199   																	{
;;;1200   																		case 0:
;;;1201                                              bsp_LedOn(7);
001316  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
001318  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOn
;;;1202                                              
;;;1203   //																		       if(display_chang_face_flag==0)
;;;1204   																					 {
;;;1205   																		         //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_out_dir);
;;;1206   																						 //LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;
;;;1207   																             //LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x01;
;;;1208   																						 LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;//display_graphic_win_dir_39x56(display_in_dir);
00131c  4885              LDR      r0,|L1.5428|
00131e  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
001320  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
001324  4983              LDR      r1,|L1.5428|
001326  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1209                                                LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x03;	
001328  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00132a  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
00132c  f0400003          ORR      r0,r0,#3
001330  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1210   																		         //display_graphic_33x64(display_A);
;;;1211   																						 LCD_buffer[0]  = 0x09;
001332  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
001334  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1212   																						 //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_mid_speed);
;;;1213   																						 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
001336  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001338  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
00133a  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
00133e  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1214   																						 LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x0C;
001340  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
001342  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;1215   																						 
;;;1216   																					 }
;;;1217   																					 Refresh_LCD();
001344  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
;;;1218   																					 step_motor_in();
001348  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_in
;;;1219   																					 
;;;1220   																					 mode_time_switch_flag = 1;
00134c  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00134e  4977              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
001350  1f09              SUBS     r1,r1,#4
001352  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1221   																		       TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_MID_SPEED;//48;
001354  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
001356  497e              LDR      r1,|L1.5456|
001358  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1222   																		       DC_MOTOR_EN;
00135a  f44f40c0          MOV      r0,#0x6000
00135e  f04f4180          MOV      r1,#0x40000000
001362  f8a10418          STRH     r0,[r1,#0x418]
001366  f04f0101          MOV      r1,#1
00136a  4878              LDR      r0,|L1.5452|
00136c  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_CtrlPWMOutputs
001370  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
001372  4876              LDR      r0,|L1.5452|
001374  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_Cmd
;;;1223   																		       dc_motor_speed_count = 2;
001378  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
00137a  496c              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
00137c  3118              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x18
00137e  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1224   																		       
;;;1225   																		       bsp_StartAutoTimer(1,60000);
001380  f64e2160          MOV      r1,#0xea60
001384  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001386  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StartAutoTimer
;;;1226                                              //flag_CO_PW = 1;
;;;1227   																					 CO2_PW_EN;
00138a  f44f4000          MOV      r0,#0x8000
00138e  496a              LDR      r1,|L1.5432|
001390  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1228   																					 flag_PM_PW = 1;																	
001392  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
001396  4969              LDR      r1,|L1.5436|
001398  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1229                                              manul_flag = 0;	       
00139a  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
00139e  4963              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
0013a0  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
0013a4  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1230   																					 led_off_flag = 0;															
0013a6  e000              B        |L1.5034|
                  |L1.5032|
0013a8  e0e6              B        |L1.5496|
                  |L1.5034|
0013aa  f101011d          ADD      r1,r1,#0x1d
0013ae  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1231   																					 break;
0013b0  e0d9              B        |L1.5478|
                  |L1.5042|
;;;1232   																		case 1:
;;;1233   																			     bsp_LedOn(7);
0013b2  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
0013b4  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOn
;;;1234   																			     
;;;1235   //																		       if(display_chang_face_flag==0)
;;;1236   																					 {
;;;1237   																		          //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_out_dir);
;;;1238   																						// LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;
;;;1239   																            // LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x01;
;;;1240   																						 LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;//display_graphic_win_dir_39x56(display_in_dir);
0013b8  485e              LDR      r0,|L1.5428|
0013ba  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
0013bc  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
0013c0  495c              LDR      r1,|L1.5428|
0013c2  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1241                                                LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x03;	
0013c4  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0013c6  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
0013c8  f0400003          ORR      r0,r0,#3
0013cc  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1242   																						  //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_low_speed);
;;;1243   																						 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
0013ce  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0013d0  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
0013d2  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
0013d6  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1244   																						 LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x08;
0013d8  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
0013da  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;1245   																						  //display_graphic_33x64(display_S);
;;;1246   																						 LCD_buffer[0] = 0x0A;
0013dc  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
0013de  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1247   																					 }
;;;1248   																					 Refresh_LCD();
0013e0  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
;;;1249   																					 step_motor_in();//step_motor_out();
0013e4  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_in
;;;1250   																					 
;;;1251   																					 
;;;1252   																					 mode_time_switch_flag = 1;
0013e8  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0013ea  4950              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
0013ec  1f09              SUBS     r1,r1,#4
0013ee  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1253   																		       TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_LOW_SPEED;//22;
0013f0  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
0013f2  4957              LDR      r1,|L1.5456|
0013f4  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1254   																		       dc_motor_speed_count = 3;																		       
0013f6  494d              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
0013f8  f1010118          ADD      r1,r1,#0x18
0013fc  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]

0013fe  f64e2160          MOV      r1,#0xea60
001402  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
001406  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StartAutoTimer
;;;1256                                              //flag_CO_PW = 1;
;;;1257   																					 CO2_PW_EN;
00140a  e001              B        |L1.5136|
                  |L1.5132|
00140c  e01e              B        |L1.5196|
                  |L1.5134|
00140e  e048              B        |L1.5282|
                  |L1.5136|
001410  f44f4000          MOV      r0,#0x8000
001414  4950              LDR      r1,|L1.5464|
001416  f8c10810          STR      r0,[r1,#0x810]
;;;1258   																					 flag_PM_PW = 1;																					 
00141a  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00141c  4947              LDR      r1,|L1.5436|
00141e  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1259   																		       manul_flag = 0;
001420  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001422  4942              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
001424  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
001426  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1260   																		       DC_MOTOR_EN;
001428  f44f40c0          MOV      r0,#0x6000
00142c  494b              LDR      r1,|L1.5468|
00142e  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
001430  f04f0101          MOV      r1,#1
001434  4845              LDR      r0,|L1.5452|
001436  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_CtrlPWMOutputs
00143a  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00143c  4843              LDR      r0,|L1.5452|

;;;1261   																		       led_off_flag = 0;

;;;1262   																			     																	
;;;1263   																					 break;
00144a  e08c              B        |L1.5478|
                  |L1.5196|
;;;1264   																		case 2:
;;;1265   																			     bsp_LedOff(7);

;;;1266   																		       bsp_LedOff(1);

;;;1267   																						 bsp_LedOff(2);
001458  2002              MOVS     r0,#2

;;;1268   																						 bsp_LedOff(3);

;;;1269   																			       bsp_LedOff(4);

;;;1270   																						 bsp_LedOff(5);

;;;1272   																		         led_off_flag = 1;

;;;1274   																						 bsp_LedOff(6);

                  |L1.5260|
;;;1276   																		
;;;1277   																		case 3:
;;;1278   																			      bsp_LedOn(7);

;;;1279                                               bsp_LedOn(8);

;;;1280   																		        led_off_flag = 0;

                  |L1.5282|
;;;1282   																		default:
;;;1283   																			     
;;;1284   																					 {
;;;1285   																		         //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_out_dir);
;;;1286   																						 LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;
0014a2  4824              LDR      r0,|L1.5428|
0014a4  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
0014a6  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
0014aa  4922              LDR      r1,|L1.5428|
0014ac  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1287   																             LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x02;
0014ae  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0014b0  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
0014b2  f0400002          ORR      r0,r0,#2
0014b6  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1288   																		         //display_graphic_33x64(display_A);
;;;1289   																						 LCD_buffer[0]  = 0x09;
0014b8  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
0014ba  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1290   																						 //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_mid_speed);
;;;1291   																						 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
0014bc  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0014be  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
0014c0  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
0014c4  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1292   																						 LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x0C;
0014c6  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
0014c8  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;1293   																						 
;;;1294   																					 }
;;;1295   																					 Refresh_LCD();
0014ca  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
;;;1296   																					 step_motor_out();
0014ce  f7fffffe          BL       step_motor_out
;;;1297   																					 
;;;1298   																					 
;;;1299   																					 mode_time_switch_flag = 1;
0014d2  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0014d4  4915              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
0014d6  1f09              SUBS     r1,r1,#4
0014d8  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1300   																		       TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_MID_SPEED;//48;
0014da  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
0014dc  491c              LDR      r1,|L1.5456|
0014de  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1301   																		       DC_MOTOR_EN;
0014e0  f44f40c0          MOV      r0,#0x6000
0014e4  f04f4180          MOV      r1,#0x40000000
0014e8  f8a10418          STRH     r0,[r1,#0x418]
0014ec  f04f0101          MOV      r1,#1
0014f0  4816              LDR      r0,|L1.5452|
0014f2  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_CtrlPWMOutputs
0014f6  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
0014f8  4814              LDR      r0,|L1.5452|
0014fa  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_Cmd
;;;1302   																		       dc_motor_speed_count = 2;
0014fe  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
001500  490a              LDR      r1,|L1.5420|
001502  3118              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x18
001504  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1303   																		       led_off_flag = 0;
001506  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001508  1d09              ADDS     r1,r1,#4
00150a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1304   																		       bsp_StartAutoTimer(1,60000);
00150c  f64e2160          MOV      r1,#0xea60
001510  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001512  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StartAutoTimer
;;;1305                                              //flag_CO_PW = 1;
;;;1306   																					 CO2_PW_EN;
001516  f44f4000          MOV      r0,#0x8000
00151a  4907              LDR      r1,|L1.5432|
00151c  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1307   																					 flag_PM_PW = 1;

001522  4906              LDR      r1,|L1.5436|
001524  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1308                                              manul_flag = 0;
001526  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
00152a  e019              B        |L1.5472|
                  |L1.5420|
                          DCD      ||.data||+0x30
                  |L1.5424|
                          DCD      shut_off_all_sensor
                  |L1.5428|
                          DCD      LCD_buffer
                  |L1.5432|
                          DCD      0x40010810
                  |L1.5436|
                          DCD      flag_PM_PW
                  |L1.5440|
                          DCD      flag_getCO2_value
                  |L1.5444|
                          DCD      flag_getPM_value
                  |L1.5448|
                          DCD      0x40011000
                  |L1.5452|
                          DCD      0x40000400
                  |L1.5456|
                          DCD      0x40000438
                  |L1.5460|
                          DCD      flag_CO_PW
                  |L1.5464|
                          DCD      0x40010000
                  |L1.5468|
                          DCD      0x40000418
                  |L1.5472|
001560  49ff              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|
001562  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1309   																					 break;
001564  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.5478|
001566  bf00              NOP                            ;1231
;;;1310   																	}
;;;1311   																	work_0_1_mode_state = 0;
001568  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00156a  49fd              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|
00156c  1e89              SUBS     r1,r1,#2
00156e  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1312   												          mode_time_count =0;	
001570  310b              ADDS     r1,r1,#0xb
001572  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; mode_time_count
;;;1313   																	shut_off_all_sensor = 0;
001574  49fb              LDR      r1,|L1.6500|
001576  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.5496|
;;;1314   														}
;;;1315   														//display_string_5x8(1,1,1,"kk");
;;;1316                               
;;;1317   														break;
001578  e2f7              B        |L1.7018|
                  |L1.5498|
;;;1318   				case IR_KEY_SPEED://dc motor speed
;;;1319           case KEY_DOWN_K3:				
00157a  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.5500|
;;;1320   					                  
;;;1321                               if(all_power_state==1&&shut_off_all_sensor == 0)
00157c  48f8              LDR      r0,|L1.6496|

001580  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; all_power_state
001582  2801              CMP      r0,#1
                  |L1.5508|
001584  d173              BNE      |L1.5742|
001586  48f7              LDR      r0,|L1.6500|
001588  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; shut_off_all_sensor
00158a  2800              CMP      r0,#0
00158c  d1fa              BNE      |L1.5508|
;;;1322   														{				
;;;1323   															    speak_one_time();

;;;1324   															
;;;1325   															    bsp_LedOn(7);
001592  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
001594  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_LedOn
;;;1326   															    //if(speed_count_direct==0)
;;;1327                                     if(dc_motor_speed_count<3&&speed_count_direct==0)
001598  48f1              LDR      r0,|L1.6496|
00159a  3019              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x19
00159c  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; dc_motor_speed_count
00159e  2803              CMP      r0,#3
0015a0  da0e              BGE      |L1.5568|
0015a2  48ef              LDR      r0,|L1.6496|
0015a4  3815              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x15
0015a6  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; speed_count_direct
0015a8  b950              CBNZ     r0,|L1.5568|
;;;1328   																	{	
;;;1329                                       speed_count_direct = 0;																		
0015aa  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0015ac  49ec              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|
0015ae  3915              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x15
0015b0  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1330   																		dc_motor_speed_count++;
0015b2  f101002e          ADD      r0,r1,#0x2e
0015b6  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; dc_motor_speed_count
0015b8  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0015ba  312e              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x2e
0015bc  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
0015be  e00f              B        |L1.5600|
                  |L1.5568|
;;;1331   																	}
;;;1332   																	else
;;;1333   																	{
;;;1334   																		
;;;1335   																		speed_count_direct = 1;

0015ce  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0015d0  312e              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x2e
0015d2  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1337   																		if(dc_motor_speed_count==0)

0015d8  b910              CBNZ     r0,|L1.5600|
;;;1338   																		{
;;;1339   																			speed_count_direct = 0;
0015da  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0015dc  392e              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x2e
0015de  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.5600|
;;;1340                                       }
;;;1341   																	}

0015e4  b948              CBNZ     r0,|L1.5626|
;;;1343   																	{
;;;1344   																		dc_motor_speed_count = 0;

                  |L1.5626|

001600  2805              CMP      r0,#5
001602  d266              BCS      |L1.5842|
001604  e8dff000          TBB      [pc,r0]

00160c  4e00              DCB      0x4e,0x00
;;;1351   																	{
;;;1352   																			case 3: 
;;;1353   																				      if(speed_count_direct == 0 )

;;;1354   																							{

00161c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]

0016bc  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_Cmd
;;;1384   																							//display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_no_speed);

                  |L1.5842|
;;;1388   																			default:
;;;1389   																							TIM3->CCR2 = 0;

0016d4  49a4              LDR      r1,|L1.6504|
0016d6  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1390   																							DC_MOTOR_DISABLE;

0016dc  f04f4180          MOV      r1,#0x40000000

0016e8  48a0              LDR      r0,|L1.6508|
0016ea  f7fffffe          BL       TIM_Cmd
;;;1391   																							//display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_no_speed);
;;;1392   																			        LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
0016ee  48a0              LDR      r0,|L1.6512|
0016f0  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer

;;;1394   																							break;
0016fe  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.5888|

;;;1395   																	}
;;;1396   																	
;;;1397   																	 manul_flag = 1;

                  |L1.5910|
;;;1400   													  }

                  |L1.5912|
;;;1403   															
;;;1404   				case KEY_DOWN_K4:	//air detect power
;;;1405           case IR_KEY_RECYCLE:

                  |L1.5914|
;;;1406

                  |L1.5922|

;;;1408   														{	
;;;1409   															    speak_one_time();

;;;1410   															    if(air_dir_recycle_count<2)
00173a  4889              LDR      r0,|L1.6496|
00173c  301a              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x1a
00173e  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; air_dir_recycle_count
001740  2802              CMP      r0,#2
001742  da07              BGE      |L1.5972|
;;;1411   																	{
;;;1412   																		air_dir_recycle_count++;
001744  4886              LDR      r0,|L1.6496|
001746  301a              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x1a
001748  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; air_dir_recycle_count
00174a  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
00174c  4984              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|
00174e  311a              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x1a
001750  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
001752  e003              B        |L1.5980|
                  |L1.5972|
;;;1413   																	}
;;;1414   																	else
;;;1415   																	{
;;;1416   																		air_dir_recycle_count = 0;

001756  4982              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|
001758  311a              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x1a
00175a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.5980|
;;;1417   																	}	
;;;1418   																	last_dc_motor_speed_count = dc_motor_speed_count;													    																	
00175c  4880              LDR      r0,|L1.6496|
00175e  3019              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x19
001760  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; dc_motor_speed_count
001762  497f              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|
001764  311c              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x1c
001766  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1419   																	switch(air_dir_recycle_count)
001768  1e88              SUBS     r0,r1,#2
00176a  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; air_dir_recycle_count
00176c  b130              CBZ      r0,|L1.6012|
00176e  2801              CMP      r0,#1
001770  d05e              BEQ      |L1.6192|
001772  2802              CMP      r0,#2
001774  d071              BEQ      |L1.6234|
001776  2803              CMP      r0,#3
001778  d16e              BNE      |L1.6232|
00177a  e0cb              B        |L1.6420|
                  |L1.6012|
;;;1420   																	{
;;;1421   																			case 0:
;;;1422   																				     
;;;1423   																				     if(last_recycle_shut_flag==1)
00177c  4878              LDR      r0,|L1.6496|

001780  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; last_recycle_shut_flag
001782  2801              CMP      r0,#1
001784  d11e              BNE      |L1.6084|
;;;1424   																						 {
;;;1425   																							 last_recycle_shut_flag = 0;

001788  4975              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|
00178a  3912              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x12
00178c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1426   																							 
;;;1427   																							 ANION_EN;

001794  6108              STR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;1428   																							 anion_PW_state = 1;

001798  4971              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|

00179c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1429   																							 LCD_buffer[7] |= 0x08;//display_graphic_tree_32x64(display_tree);
00179e  4874              LDR      r0,|L1.6512|
0017a0  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
0017a2  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
0017a6  4972              LDR      r1,|L1.6512|
0017a8  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;1430   																							 
;;;1431   																							 start_delay_30_flag = 0;

0017ac  496c              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|
0017ae  310d              ADDS     r1,r1,#0xd
0017b0  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]

;;;1435

;;;1437   																			       shut_off_all_sensor = 0;

;;;1438   																					   PM2_5_Green_Led();

;;;1439   																						 flag_PM_PW = 1;

0017d0  4969              LDR      r1,|L1.6520|
0017d2  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1440   																						 //LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x08;//speed led

;;;1442   																			       //power_on_init_time_flag = 0;
;;;1443   																			       co2_Green_Led();

;;;1444   																						 CO2_PW_EN;

0017e0  4967              LDR      r1,|L1.6528|

;;;1445   																			       
;;;1446   																						 {
;;;1447   																							 LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;//display_graphic_win_dir_39x56(display_in_dir);

0017e6  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
0017e8  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
0017ec  4960              LDR      r1,|L1.6512|
0017ee  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1448   																							 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x03;

0017f2  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer

0017f8  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1449   																						 }
;;;1450   																						 //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_mid_speed);
;;;1451   																						 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed
0017fa  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0017fc  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer
0017fe  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
001802  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1452   																						 LCD_buffer[2]  = 0x0C;
001804  f04f000c          MOV      r0,#0xc
001808  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;1453   																						 dc_motor_speed_count = 2;
00180a  f04f0002          MOV      r0,#2
00180e  4954              LDR      r1,|L1.6496|
001810  f1010119          ADD      r1,r1,#0x19
001814  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1454   																						 Refresh_LCD();

;;;1455   																						 start_motor();
00181a  f7fffffe          BL       start_motor
;;;1456   																						 TIM3->CCR2 = DC_MOTOR_MID_SPEED;//48;

001820  e000              B        |L1.6180|
                  |L1.6178|
001822  e0b4              B        |L1.6542|
                  |L1.6180|
001824  0701              LSLS     r1,r0,#28
001826  f8a10438          STRH     r0,[r1,#0x438]
;;;1457   																							
;;;1458   																						 step_motor_in();

;;;1459   																						 
;;;1460   																						
;;;1461   																						 break;
00182e  e096              B        |L1.6494|
                  |L1.6192|
;;;1462   																			case 1:
;;;1463   																				      
;;;1464   																						 {
;;;1465   																							 //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_out_dir);
;;;1466   																							 LCD_buffer[1] &= 0x08;

001832  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]  ; LCD_buffer

001838  494d              LDR      r1,|L1.6512|
00183a  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;1467   																							 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x02;

;;;1470   																					   step_motor_out();

;;;1471   																				     shut_off_all_sensor = 0;

                  |L1.6234|

;;;1486   																						 dc_motor_speed_count = 4;

00187c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1487   																						 //display_graphic_speed_33x64(display_no_speed);
;;;1488   																						 LCD_buffer[1] |= 0x08;//led speed

0018f0  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;1508   																			      // Clear_LCD();

;;;1510   																							 //display_graphic_win_dir_39x64(display_stright_dir);

;;;1523   																						 bsp_LedOff(2);

;;;1524   																						 bsp_LedOff(3);

;;;1527   																						 bsp_LedOff(6);

;;;1528   																						 flag_PM_PW = 0;

;;;1531   																						 break;
00195c  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.6494|
00195e  e015              B        |L1.6540|
                  |L1.6496|

;;;1533   																	}

                  |L1.6544|
;;;1539   														
;;;1540   				case KEY_DOWN_K5:	//anion power
;;;1541           case IR_KEY_ANION:

                  |L1.6546|
;;;1542   					                  
;;;1543   					                  if(all_power_state==1)
001992  4878              LDR      r0,|L1.7028|
001994  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; all_power_state
001996  2801              CMP      r0,#1
001998  d125              BNE      |L1.6630|
;;;1544   														{			
;;;1545   															    speak_one_time();
00199a  f7fffffe          BL       speak_one_time
;;;1546   																	if(anion_PW_state==0)
00199e  4875              LDR      r0,|L1.7028|
0019a0  380b              SUBS     r0,r0,#0xb
0019a2  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; anion_PW_state
0019a4  b988              CBNZ     r0,|L1.6602|
;;;1547   																	{
;;;1548   																		ANION_EN;

;;;1549   																		anion_PW_state = 1;
0019ae  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0019b0  4970              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
0019b2  390b              SUBS     r1,r1,#0xb
0019b4  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1550   																		LCD_buffer[7] |= 0x08;//display_graphic_tree_32x64(display_tree);

0019b8  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
0019ba  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
0019be  496f              LDR      r1,|L1.7036|
0019c0  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]

                  |L1.6596|

                  |L1.6598|

                  |L1.6600|
0019c8  e0ce              B        |L1.7016|
                  |L1.6602|
;;;1551   																	}
;;;1552   																	else
;;;1553   																	{
;;;1554   																		ANION_DISABLE;

0019d0  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;1555   																		anion_PW_state = 0;
0019d2  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0019d4  4967              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
0019d6  390b              SUBS     r1,r1,#0xb
0019d8  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1556   																		LCD_buffer[7] &= 0x07;//display_graphic_tree_clear();

0019dc  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; LCD_buffer
0019de  f0000007          AND      r0,r0,#7
0019e2  4966              LDR      r1,|L1.7036|
0019e4  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
                  |L1.6630|
;;;1557   																	}
;;;1558   													  }
;;;1559   														
;;;1560   														break;
0019e6  e0c0              B        |L1.7018|
                  |L1.6632|
;;;1561   														
;;;1562   			  case KEY_DOWN_K6:	//TIME
;;;1563           case IR_KEY_TIME:	//第6键		
0019e8  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.6634|
;;;1564   					                  
;;;1565   					                  if(all_power_state==1)
0019ea  4862              LDR      r0,|L1.7028|
0019ec  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; all_power_state
0019ee  2801              CMP      r0,#1
0019f0  d172              BNE      |L1.6872|
;;;1566   														{	
;;;1567   															    speak_one_time();
0019f2  f7fffffe          BL       speak_one_time
;;;1568   															    if(timing_state<5)
0019f6  485f              LDR      r0,|L1.7028|
0019f8  301a              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x1a
0019fa  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; timing_state
0019fc  2805              CMP      r0,#5
0019fe  da07              BGE      |L1.6672|
;;;1569   																	{
;;;1570   																		timing_state++;
001a00  485c              LDR      r0,|L1.7028|
001a02  301a              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x1a
001a04  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; timing_state
001a06  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
001a08  495a              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
001a0a  311a              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x1a
001a0c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
001a0e  e003              B        |L1.6680|
                  |L1.6672|
;;;1571   																	}
;;;1572   																	else
;;;1573   																	{
;;;1574   																		timing_state = 0;
001a10  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001a12  4958              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
001a14  311a              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x1a
001a16  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.6680|
;;;1575   																	}
;;;1576   																	
;;;1577   																	if(timing_state!=5)
001a18  4856              LDR      r0,|L1.7028|
001a1a  301a              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x1a
001a1c  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; timing_state
001a1e  2805              CMP      r0,#5
001a20  d004              BEQ      |L1.6700|
;;;1578   																	{
;;;1579   																		timing_flag = 1;
001a22  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001a24  4953              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
001a26  390c              SUBS     r1,r1,#0xc
001a28  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
001a2a  e003              B        |L1.6708|
                  |L1.6700|
;;;1580   																	}
;;;1581   																	else
;;;1582   																	{
;;;1583   																		timing_flag = 0;
001a2c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001a2e  4951              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
001a30  390c              SUBS     r1,r1,#0xc
001a32  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.6708|
;;;1584   																	}
;;;1585   																	bsp_StartAutoTimer(0,60000);
001a34  f64e2160          MOV      r1,#0xea60
001a38  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001a3a  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StartAutoTimer
;;;1586   																	switch(timing_state)
001a3e  484d              LDR      r0,|L1.7028|
001a40  301a              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x1a
001a42  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; timing_state
001a44  2806              CMP      r0,#6
001a46  d275              BCS      |L1.6964|
001a48  e8dff000          TBB      [pc,r0]
001a4c  03192f47          DCB      0x03,0x19,0x2f,0x47
001a50  5d75              DCB      0x5d,0x75
;;;1587   																	{
;;;1588   																		case 0:
;;;1589   																					 timing_time_min_value = 120;
001a52  2078              MOVS     r0,#0x78
001a54  4947              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
001a56  3908              SUBS     r1,r1,#8
001a58  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; timing_time_min_value
;;;1590   																		       //display_graphic_54x64_single_clear();
;;;1591   																		       //display_graphic_27x64_single(display_time_2);
;;;1592   																		       LCD_buffer[3]  = 0x00;//speed led
001a5a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001a5c  4947              LDR      r1,|L1.7036|
001a5e  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]
;;;1593   																					 LCD_buffer[4]  = 0x08;//speed led
001a60  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
001a62  7108              STRB     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;1594   																					 LCD_buffer[5]  = 0x0D;//speed led
001a64  200d              MOVS     r0,#0xd
001a66  7148              STRB     r0,[r1,#5]
;;;1595   																					 LCD_buffer[6] &= 0x08;//speed led
001a68  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001a6a  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer
001a6c  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
001a70  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1596   																					 LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x03;//speed led
001a72  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001a74  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer
001a76  f0400003          ORR      r0,r0,#3
001a7a  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1597   																					 break;
001a7c  e072              B        |L1.7012|
;;;1598   																		case 1:
;;;1599   																					 timing_time_min_value = 240;
001a7e  20f0              MOVS     r0,#0xf0
001a80  493c              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
001a82  3908              SUBS     r1,r1,#8
001a84  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; timing_time_min_value
;;;1600   																	         //display_graphic_27x64_single(display_time_4);
;;;1601   																		       LCD_buffer[3]  = 0x00;//speed led
001a86  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001a88  493c              LDR      r1,|L1.7036|
001a8a  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]
;;;1602   																					 LCD_buffer[4]  = 0x08;//speed led
001a8c  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
001a8e  7108              STRB     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;1603   																					 LCD_buffer[5]  = 0x02;//speed led
001a90  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
001a92  7148              STRB     r0,[r1,#5]
;;;1604   																					 LCD_buffer[6] &= 0x08;//speed led
001a94  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001a96  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer
001a98  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
001a9c  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1605   																					 LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x07;//speed led
001a9e  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001aa0  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer
001aa2  f0400007          ORR      r0,r0,#7
001aa6  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1606   																					 break;
001aa8  e05c              B        |L1.7012|
;;;1607   																		case 2:
;;;1608   																					 timing_time_min_value = 480;
001aaa  f44f70f0          MOV      r0,#0x1e0
001aae  4931              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
001ab0  3908              SUBS     r1,r1,#8
001ab2  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; timing_time_min_value
;;;1609   																		       //display_graphic_27x64_single(display_time_8);
;;;1610   																		       LCD_buffer[3]  = 0x00;//speed led

001ab6  4931              LDR      r1,|L1.7036|
001ab8  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]
;;;1611   																					 LCD_buffer[4]  = 0x08;//speed led
001aba  2008              MOVS     r0,#8

001abe  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
001ac0  7148              STRB     r0,[r1,#5]

001ac6  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
001aca  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1614   																					 LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x07;//speed led

                  |L1.6872|

;;;1616   																		case 3:
;;;1617   																					 timing_time_min_value = 720;

;;;1622   																					 LCD_buffer[5]  = 0x0D;//speed led

;;;1623   																					 LCD_buffer[6] &= 0x08;//speed led
001af0  4608              MOV      r0,r1

001af8  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1624   																					 LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x03;//speed led

001b02  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1625   																					 break;
001b04  e02e              B        |L1.7012|
;;;1626   																		
;;;1627   																		case 4:
;;;1628   																					 timing_time_min_value = 1440;
001b06  f44f60b4          MOV      r0,#0x5a0
001b0a  491a              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
001b0c  3908              SUBS     r1,r1,#8
001b0e  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; timing_time_min_value
;;;1629   																		       //display_graphic_27x64_1(display_time_2);
;;;1630   																		       //display_graphic_27x64_2(display_time_4);

001b10  200d              MOVS     r0,#0xd
001b12  491a              LDR      r1,|L1.7036|

;;;1632   																					 LCD_buffer[4]  = 0x0B;//speed led
001b16  200b              MOVS     r0,#0xb
001b18  7108              STRB     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;1633   																					 LCD_buffer[5]  = 0x02;//speed led
001b1a  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
001b1c  7148              STRB     r0,[r1,#5]
;;;1634   																					 LCD_buffer[6] &= 0x08;//speed led
001b1e  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001b20  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer
001b22  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
001b26  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1635   																					 LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x07;//speed led
001b28  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001b2a  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer

;;;1636   																					 break;
001b32  e017              B        |L1.7012|
                  |L1.6964|
001b34  e011              B        |L1.7002|
;;;1637   																		case 5:
;;;1638   //                                         //ff																	
;;;1639   																		       LCD_buffer[3]  = 0x0F;//speed led
001b36  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
001b38  4910              LDR      r1,|L1.7036|
001b3a  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]
;;;1640   																					 LCD_buffer[4]  = 0x0D;//speed led
001b3c  200d              MOVS     r0,#0xd
001b3e  7108              STRB     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;1641   																					 LCD_buffer[5]  = 0x0F;//speed led
001b40  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
001b42  7148              STRB     r0,[r1,#5]
;;;1642   																					 LCD_buffer[6] &= 0x08;//speed led
001b44  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001b46  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; LCD_buffer
001b48  f0000008          AND      r0,r0,#8
001b4c  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1643   																					 LCD_buffer[6] |= 0x05;//speed led
001b4e  4608              MOV      r0,r1

001b56  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1644   																					 break;
001b58  e004              B        |L1.7012|
                  |L1.7002|
;;;1645   																		default:
;;;1646   																					 timing_time_min_value = 60;
001b5a  203c              MOVS     r0,#0x3c
001b5c  4905              LDR      r1,|L1.7028|
001b5e  3908              SUBS     r1,r1,#8
001b60  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; timing_time_min_value
;;;1647   																					 break;
001b62  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.7012|
001b64  bf00              NOP                            ;1597
                  |L1.7014|
;;;1648   																	}
;;;1649   																	
;;;1650   													  }
;;;1651   														
;;;1652   														break;
001b66  e000              B        |L1.7018|
                  |L1.7016|
;;;1653   				
;;;1654   				default:
;;;1655   														if (ucKeyCode >= IR_KEY_STRAT)
;;;1656   														{
;;;1657   														}
;;;1658   														break;
001b68  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.7018|
001b6a  bf00              NOP                            ;1166
;;;1659   			}
;;;1660   			
;;;1661   			Refresh_LCD();
001b6c  f7fffffe          BL       Refresh_LCD
                  |L1.7024|
001b70  f7febe70          B        |L1.2132|
;;;1662   		}
;;;1663   		
;;;1664   	}
;;;1665   }
                          ENDP

                  |L1.7028|
                          DCD      ||.data||+0x30
                  |L1.7032|
                          DCD      0x40011000
                  |L1.7036|
                          DCD      LCD_buffer

                          AREA ||.bss||, DATA, NOINIT, ALIGN=0

                  display_num_PM
                          %        12
                  keys_show
                          %        30

                  get_CO2_CMD
